Summary: We spent 2 nights at the Marriott Bayview.  While technically in Newport Beach it's pretty much at the Irvine border.  The hotel is located next to an office park and gated residential area but does overlook a protected lagoon with a very nice walking trail just steps from the  entrance.  Rooms are all suites with a lot of room.  Furnishings are functional but a bit clunky and pretty institutional.  The gym is fairly basic but does have a Peloton bike.  The restaurant is not very busy but breakfast service is good, including an omelet station.  Marriott platinum members on receive a continental breakfast offering.  Parking is available but costs $39 per night which is a bit steep. For those concerned about security they should be aware that one notable thing missing from rooms
Room tip: Look for AAA rates that include full breakfast and parking.
Manager Response: Dear DW123418,  Thank you for being our guest and sharing your review. W are glad you enjoyed your overall time here and liked our convenient location, accommodations, and thoughtful service. However, we regret not meeting your expectations in some areas and are sorry that we had one elevator down for unplanned maintenance. We apologize for the inconvenience this caused and are grateful for your patience. We appreciate hearing from our guests and hope you will stay with us again for a much-improved experience.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: We have stayed at this property a number of times and it is always very nice.    The check is was efficient and nice.  We were in our room within about 10 minutes after arriving at the hotel.    The rooms are great.  They are spacious and relaxing.     The fitness center is nice.  I was able to get my usual workout in, which I greatly appreciate.  It was too cold to go out for a jog next to the estuary.  In the past, I have gone for a jog on the trail that runs along the estuary.  This is a fantastic amenity.  The trail is right across the street from the hotel.    The hotel is located a short drive from Balboa Island and Balboa Peninsula.  Both Balboa Island and Peninsula have great restaurants to enjoy, and we did exactly that.    We had breakfast at the hotel in the morning.

My wife and I often stay at Marriot properties throughout the United States. We are retired and do a lot of travel in the US and abroad. The customer service at each Marriott Hotel location has been very good, however at the Marriott Bayview, Newport Beach the service we received upon arrival and all throughout our one-week stay were exceptional. Let me explain. When we arrived at the Hotel, my wife and I was greeted by Josiah Escamilla, the Manager. To say he was very professional, very polite, and very accommodating is an understatement. Josiah was excellent in the attention he gave us, his professional demeanor, and most of all the unbelievable hospitality that Josiah showed us was just…incredible. Never before have we ever been treated with such hospitality in such a
Room tip: All the floors are very nice and there is very good sound isolation between rooms. Very quiet.
Manager Response: Dear brianwD362WP,  First and foremost, thank you for your loyalty to our brands and for choosing Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We love knowing you and your wife had an outstanding stay and that our team left a great impression. They work tirelessly to provide the best service, down to the smallest detail. We will enjoy sharing your kind comments with the associates you mentioned. We will enjoy sharing your feedback with them! We appreciate having you as our guest, and we look forward to seeing you both again soon.   Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: As a Lifetime Titanium and perpetual Ambassador to the Marriott brand, I choose my hotels carefully.  This hotel experience was both a pleasure and a disappointment.  First, the pleasure:  The restaurant and bar staff is excellent. Breakfast and dinner was highlighted by professionalism,  constant smiles, and delicious food.  The valet and concierge (?) helping arriving patrons was a great front man.  Sadly the front desk staff was ill trained or incompetent.  No status recognition.  Upon check in, we were informed that our reservations were for check in a day earlier,  therefore our rooms had been canceled.  Our confirmations and emails from Marriott proved otherwise. Upgrades weren't available,  rooms were incorrect and names were confused. Staff changed so often that we
Room tip: Room on the 6th floor and above are the most desirable.  If you have BonVoy status, make certain...
Manager Response: Dear CobaltConnection,  Thank you for being a valued Marriott Bonvoy Titanium Elite member and for your loyalty to our brand. We apologize for not providing you with the hospitality you expected from our front desk. We will follow up on your comments appropriately, and we will take the necessary measures to ensure we are well-poised to serve you better.   On a positive note, we are glad you had a pleasant dining experience and that you were pleased with some of our courteous associates.   We are grateful for your feedback, and we hope to have another chance to make a more favorable impression.   Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Great hotel with friendly staff and nice cold beer.  The rooms are very large and have everything you need. The bathrooms are exceptional and everything is cleaned to a very high standard.  There’s not a lot to do immediately around the hotel itself, but a 15min Uber ride gets you to all the hot spots down on the beach.

This is a nice Marriott, well maintained, very clean, friendly staff.  Breakfast outside was nice, great weather and waiters were very attentive.  Room was well sized and comfortable.  Plenty of space for an outdoor walk.    One downside was the lack of a view. The Bay looked more like a swamp and to get to it, required crossing a major road.  Despite the road, there wasn't a lot of noise.  Internet was great.  Drive from John Wayne Airport was about 15 minutes and an easy drive.  I will say that parking was a bit screwy as it was a good hike to the check in from the parking area.  Other issue was, no doorman/bell hop so we trudged through with our luggage.    Definitely good enough for a night or two for work.
Manager Response: Dear JamesEMoon,   We love our loyal guests. Thank you for staying with us at the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview and for your wonderful feedback about our hotel. As a member of Marriott Bonvoy, we appreciate your loyalty to our brands, and we are very glad we could accommodate you on this visit. We hope you will come back and stay with us again soon!   Charles Cho,  General Manager

Summary: This was my second time having lunch at Marriott Bayview. I appreciate the convenience of grabbing lunch without the hassle of parking and a beautiful view of the Newport Bay. Meaning, the easy access for parking and the short distance to the entrance of the lobby/restaurant, I was all good. The server was very attentive (can't remember his name) and repeatedly refilled my ice tea. The food was delicious and delivered timely. I suggest the beet salad and the shrimp taco's. In short, I wanted to  share my exceptional service experience to anyone who's in the area.

Summary Heading: Just an average visit to Newport Beach Marriott
Summary: We are Lifetime Titanium Elite, and have stayed in many Marriott brand hotels.  Especially the last month, we've stayed a whole month in different hotels and locations from L.A, Las Vegas, Utah & SF.  We expected the hotel to be really nice and grand using our 40,000 points each night, but the hotel disappointingly was just sad. We didn't get the Bay view upgrade that we requested, but from other location in the building near the elevator window, we can see the Bayview.   Perhaps we came with too much expectations.  Upon check in, we found the hairdryer in the room was completely broken with all the electrical wiring out.  My son was the first to shower, and use the hairdryer.  But when he was about to use it, he was smart enough to ask me why the plug looks so weird and have
Room tip: Family room might be good for family needing more beds. But space is tight.
Manager Response: Dear member9999,  Thank you for being a valued Marriott Bonvoy Titanium Elite member and sharing your review. Our main aim is to provide thoughtful hospitality to our guests; therefore, we apologize for not meeting your expectations. Your feedback is valuable to us as it helps us improve our service moving forward. We are also sorry for the issues you had with the breakfast we offer, and we will share your comments with our food and beverage team to see where we can improve. Furthermore, we are committed to providing our guests a fulfilling stay; therefore, we appreciate you bringing these concerns to our attention. We will address your comments with the appropriate individuals and thank you again for your patience.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Exceptional experiences and service during stay.  Truly remarkable and friendly staff!   Excellent culinary dining experiences in the evening and breakfast. Great location of the Newport Beach areas.  We look forward to returning to the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview!
Manager Response: Dear Anthony G,  Our gratitude for taking the time to review your stay with us. It is delightful to read about your family vacation here and how much you were pleased with the food we serve. We are also happy you enjoyed our location and the friendly interactions you had with our associates. All of us at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview look forward to having you stay with us again.   Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Finally a Marriott that lived up to its brand.  Room was clean service was amazing. We enjoyed our stay since this was a relaxing two days for my family.    Thanks to the staff and all the suggestions. We rented bikes but I was 15 minutes late to join my family so the gave us the time back without charging.  We included breakfast in the room charge and was happy with the food.  I will definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: Hotel is nice BUT Vista Restaurant Horrible!!
Summary: The hotel is nice and the folks at the front desk are helpful. However stay far away from the Vista restaurant. The service at the restaurant is horrible. We ate there a few times and the last time for breakfast was just a nightmare. My wife ordered eggs Benedict and we waited a half hour and the food never came. For a Marriott or any hotel that was totally unacceptable. Again stay far away and go eat elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear Barryd,  Thank you for posting a review of your recent stay with us. We are happy you liked some aspects of our hotel and especially pleased with the service provided by our front desk associates. However, we are sorry for the disappointment you had with our on-site restaurant. We understand your frustration due to the lack of attentive service you mentioned. Please be assured we will share this with the appropriate team to improve our service going forward. We hope to be your hotel of choice if another visit to our area is in your plans.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: The staff were great and ensured I had information of the local area.  The bay view was good, except the photos (on the website) looked as if the bay view was closer to the room.  The bedding was great, and I was able to sleep.  I like the breakfast, especially the oatmeal, vegetable omelet and hash browns. I would recommend this hotel to family or friends, and I would stay there again.

Summary Heading: Staff offset the very dated and loud rooms
Summary: The staff is great, including the bartenders, the location is good and scenic and the breakfast was quite good, but the hotel needs a renovation ASAP.  The rooms are dated and dark while you can hear the jets flying overhead and anyone talking in the hallway.
Manager Response: Dear CLEShawn,  Thank you for the honest review and for choosing our hotel. We are pleased to hear your compliments about our associates, location, and the breakfast we served. We appreciate your comments regarding the need to update, and they will be used to plan for future updates and to freshen up our accommodations. We continue to receive high marks for service and cleanliness, and we appreciate the feedback that helps us move forward. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: We’ve stayed at this property on and off for 26 years. It’s under terrific management and we felt welcomed and valued as titanium guests.  The property is in a beautiful area with access to trails all around the lovely back bay and a short walk to the Peter and Mary Muth interpretive center.   The rooms are large , comfortable and well appointed suites.  Everything was immaculate.  “Javier” has been cooking for 27 years and is pure sunshine.  We had a delicious buffet breakfast with excellent service.  Even the serving staff looked stylish in their “uniforms”.  It’s easy to feel loyal to this treasured property.  Thank you for maintaining your wonderful feel and making your guests feel so special!
Manager Response: Dear bluewar,  Thank you for being a valued Marriott Bonvoy Titanium Elite member and for sharing your comments with other travelers. It is delightful to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview and that our friendly service, ideal location, comfortable accommodations, and delectable breakfast. We will gladly share your generous compliments with our entire team. Thank you once more for choosing us, and we look forward to having the pleasure of welcoming you again soon.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: The rooms are oppressively painted bright white, the television in the living area is way to big and the one in bedroom in an awkward corner and the bathroom is old with poor hot water quality in shower. Restaurant is fine, hotel’s clean, service and people very good.  Fairly quiet. Fine for a business stay.  Not much of a pool area, not really a family spot. Do not take rooms on even side ending in “02 to “08” since they’re positioned right next to or above massive fan unit that can be heard  in the room. Loudly. Fortunately, I moved.
Manager Response: Dear kev1438,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are glad to know you were impressed with the cleanliness of our property and that you liked our courteous associates. We are sorry for the disappointment you had with your room. We will continue to keep striving for improvements at every turn, and your feedback is, indeed, instrumental towards that goal.   We are also sorry for the noise you experienced during your visit as well as the trouble you had due to relocating. Your feedback is valuable, and it will be shared with the appropriate individuals to ensure a better outcome as we advance. We hope you will give us a chance to redeem ourselves the next time you are in the area.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Stayed on business recently. Excellent location. They have a private parking and entrance arrangement for Bonvoy Elites. Very convenient. Rooms are great resto and bar are good. Pool looked nice but I did not use. Wish they had a concierge lounge but no just a breakfast credit for Elites. Will definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: Great hotel with views and the back bay!
Summary: Such a beautiful hotel.  The room was spacious with the bed from the wall and a sofa bed it really accommodated.  We were greeted by Hillary N. Who gave us some local recommendations for food that were delicious and also told us about the back bay trail walking distance from the hotel which we did in the morning and it was perfect! Absolutely can’t wait to come back.

EXCEPTIONAL HOTEL ACCOMMODATIONS  AND REMARKABLE STAFF Catharine, Mariana, Lorna, Stephanie, Edison, Derick, Anthony, Tommy, Blanca in housekeeping, and ALL the restaurant staff are all so remarkable in making our extended stay comfortable, very clean, secure, safe, and a extremely satisfying stay. In a nutsgell, it has been an asolutely overwhelmingly awesome stay   Thank you very much for the PHENOMENAL CUSTOMER SERVICE experience while we stayed in your extraordinary large suites, with all the  BEAUTIFUL surroundings at your property. To top it off it's a fabulous location with  easy access to everywhere!
Manager Response: Dear Melinda B,   Thank you for your terrific review of Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We enjoyed reading your flattering comments about our thoughtful hospitality and all-suite accommodations, all of which are designed to help you relax after a day of exploring our exciting area. It will be a pleasure to share your generous compliments with the team members you mentioned for taking such great care of you. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you again for another gratifying stay.   Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview previously, so we were looking forward to back.  The hotel is nice since the rooms are suites.  The suite gives you ample room.    The hotel is beginning to look a bit dated.  The hotel is clean and maintained.  The hotel's pool is very nice.     The best part of this hotel is its location.  An estuary is located across the street.  The estuary is a wonderful place to go for a walk or run.  Additionally, UC Irvine is located about a mile away.  My wife and I enjoy college sports and having the opportunity to go to UC Irvine to watch baseball or basketball is a bonus for us.    The hotel's staff is rather aloof.  Being a Marriott property, I find this shocking.  Most Marriott's have a warm and welcoming staff.  It takes very
Manager Response: Dear briancS6817MR,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are pleased to know you enjoyed our ideal location, spacious accommodations, and your overall stay. However, we apologize for the lack of friendliness you received from our associates, and you have our assurance this has been addressed. We would love to welcome you back to show you our hotel's high service standards. Also, We appreciate your comments regarding remodeling our hotel, and they will be used to plan for future updates and to freshen up our accommodations. We are grateful for all the feedback that helps us improve moving forward. Thank you once more for choosing us again and for your continued business. We wish you all the best with your travels and hope to have the opportunity to serve you better in the future.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: We came for a quick trip to visit our daughter at UC Irvine. Good location with proximity to Newport Beach, shopping, and UC Irvine. Professional staff. They allowed us an early checkin, which we really appreciated. We liked having the suite which allowed our teenager to sleep in her own space on the sofa bed .   The reason why 3 stars only is that the room, and bathroom especially, are dated. Needs updating/remodel.
Manager Response: Dear Bodelicious,  Thank you for the honest review and for choosing our hotel while you were here to visit your daughter. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your overall stay and especially liked our convenient location. We understand your comments, and they will be used to plan for future updates and to freshen up our accommodations. We continue to receive high marks for service and cleanliness, and we appreciate the feedback that helps us moving forward. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary Heading: A gorgeous Gem with a fantastic heated pool!
Summary: I looked at tons of Newport hotels for a quick night getaway with kids to catch the AM boat to Catalina.    This was the pick, and by far it did not disappoint!  Half the price of others - and twice the value!  We had a gorgeous suite room, and went down to the pool to discover it was twice the size pictured - and HEATED (not semi, but actually heated)!  Hot tub was likewise actually hot - and so lovely!   Food at restaurant was lovely as were fire pits around tables - and that view!  Definitely this is a great getaway spot on its own, and such a great spot to catch the ferry.  For a great overall value with beautiful rooms, this is the spot.
Manager Response: Dear Dorothy S,   Thank you for choosing Newport Beach Marriott Bayview for your getaway and for taking the time to share your wonderful review. We appreciate you mentioning what an excellent value we offer to our guests, and we are pleased you enjoyed our elegant accommodations and enriching amenities, including our invigorating outdoor pool and hot tub. It is also gratifying to read you found our location to be perfect for your needs and that you loved dining at our on-site restaurant, Vista.Kitchen.Bar. Thank you once more for recommending us to future travelers, and we hope to be your first choice every time you visit our area.   Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: we planned this trip as a birthday getaway for our daughter. upon arrival the staff was lovely! very friendly and professional. the real issue is there wasn’t enough of them. room service took over 90 minutes to arrive. we called multiple times as the estimated time was 45 min and no one would ever answer the line. we chalked it up to bad timing until it was time to go to bed.  neither beds had correct bottom sheets. the king bed had a full size sheet thrown on it. and there was ono one blanket for 2 beds. i called and requested more bedding. each time i was told someone was on their way up….after an hour i had to go downstairs to retrieve blankets & a proper sheet. i was met with ‘not my fault, i just arrived’ excuses. the next day the wait time to be seated for breakfast was
Manager Response: Dear E597ZTjenm,  Thank you for your review regarding your stay at our hotel. Please accept our apologies for our staff not being attentive to your needs and the unsatisfactory service you received during your stay. We have shared your observations appropriately for immediate attention. We are specifically worried to read your comments about the pool water and are truly sorry for the inconvenience this caused. We take such concerns very seriously and will look into it with our team. We regret that your daughter's birthday trip was anything other than perfect. We can do better and hope you will give us another opportunity to regain your trust in the future.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location for shopping, eating and exploring!
Summary: This hotel location is perfect with a great view. The lobby entrance was quite awkward as you feel like you are walking into a hospital. In other words, it may need to improve its first impressions aka entrance :) At any rate, I cannot complain because the location is perfect to head over to the beach, restaurants and shopping. It is also close to the freeway but you do not feel affected by the proximity of the freeway. We were upgraded to the top floor (7th) and had the view facing the bay.

We stayed 2 nights at  the Bayview Marriott and give it a 5 star rating.  Our room, 415, overlooked the bay, was a suite and was lovely.  Room service food was excellent and very prompt. We, also, ate in the restaurant one night and it was enjoyable.
Manager Response: Dear emacv,  Thank you for your gracious review of Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. It is rewarding to know you loved your well-appointed suite featuring scenic bay views and the delectable room service food we serve. We are also glad to read you enjoyed dining at our on-site restaurant, Vista.Kitchen.Bar. We appreciate your excellent feedback and hope to be your first choice every time you visit Newport.   Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Mariana @ the front desk made our stay so easy and enjoyable, right from the start! It's so hard to find helpful staff these days but The Marriott Newport should definitely recognize Mariana & company for going above & beyond.

Summary Heading: Newport Beach Marriott Bayview - Nice Stay / Excellent Service
Summary: I am a Platinum Marriott Rewards Member and I recently spent two nights at the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview.  I enjoyed my stay and I found this all suites hotel to be well staffed, clean, comfortable, and accommodating.  Initially, my early check-in and late check-out request was accommodated without issue.  I stayed in a King suite, which was spacious and clean.  The only minor drawback was that the mattress could have been more firm and the entire suite was carpeted rather tile or hardwood.   Nevertheless, still a comfortable room.  This hotel also features a heated indoor/outdoor pool, a very nice breakfast buffet, which includes an omelette station, and a nice gym, which includes treadmills, stationary bikes, an elyptical machine, a peloton bike, free weights, leg
Manager Response: Dear GSP67,   Thank you for being a valued Marriott Bonvoy Platinum Elite member and for reviewing your recent stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. It is gratifying to know you loved our fresh, relaxing all-suite accommodations and the thoughtful service provided by our associates combined with our ideal location with easy access to John Wayne Airport and Huntington beach. We are also glad to read you enjoyed dining at our on-site restaurant, Vista.Kitchen.Bar and that you were able to take advantage of our enriching amenities, including our indoor/outdoor connecting pool and well-equipped fitness center. We have also shared your additional comments about the mattress with the appropriate team, as we are always looking for ways to improve. We value your feedback and hope we will be the first hotel you think of on future trips to Newport. Safe Travels!  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: After realizing no butter was sent with our pancakes and waffles, we called room service. 20+ mins later still no butter. Called them again, was put on hold and then disconnected. By now food is ice cold. Called front desk explained the course of events and asked to have the food taken off of my bill. I was told, in a very dismissive tone, they would need to come to my room and get the uneaten food. OKAY REALLY? You can find the time to come and get the cold food but not bring butter? And to make matters worse, we gave the server an extra $5 on top of the mandatory gratuity. Will not go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback, we take your concerns very seriously. Please accept my sincere apology for this experience that did not meet your expectations or ours. As a result, I would like to get in touch with you personally, I could be reached at anthony.elsisi@marriott.com. I look forward for your communication.

Summary: I stayed in this hotel during a Sports Leisure Vacations tour to the Pageant of the Masters in Laguna Beach. It is an all suite hotel. I absolutely loved my suite! It was spacious, clean and new. Great Cal King bed. Flat screen TV both in the bedroom and living room. I had breakfast every morning in the dining room. All my meals were delicious! Also, had dinner here once. I ordered the Power Bowl and it was also delicious. Staff were fast, efficient & friendly. BJ does a great job as this hotel's Hospitality Manager. The only drawback of staying here is that you have to Uber to other restaurants, shopping, etc. There is nothing around this hotel in that respect.

Hotel is dated. Not up to current Marriott standards. Mattress is caved in on both sides and crowned in the middle. Jet noise from Orange County Airport. Industrial area lacking convenient shopping or dining. No need to charge $33 for parking. Bayview is mostly "street" view, Though staff is friendly, definitely would NOT stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, and we thank you for being our guest, i would like to share with you that there is a plan to remodel our guest rooms in the near future, we hope to serve you again in the near future. I'm so glad to learn that you have found our team to be friendly, this is highly appreciated as we strive to do that.

Summary: The hotel it self is okay,.. bed is pretty old,.. sagged,.. they have a pretty decent looking gym only if you can find it,... you have to ask where and even if you can see it,.. you can’t get to it,..  poorly designed.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for your valuable feedback. As we always work in improving our service and elevate our guest experience feedback such as yours is welcome as it helps us achieve our goal. We are proud to offer all Suite accommodations of 425 sf for each of our 254 suites, we are considered to have the most spacious rooms in the area. Moreover, we understand success is never ending. Therefore, improving our directional signage to the pool is something we can improve on. Thank you again for being our guest and we hope to server you in the near future.

Summary: I have stayed here several times during Covid just for the wife and I to get away on a little staycation as we live within an hour of Newport Beach.  First, this hotel is not on or near the beach. The title "Bayview" is a little misleading as it's just a little sliver of water that could be mistaken for a creek. You can't see the ocean or anything like that. There's no boats etc.  Mostly houses and streets are the view, but still a pretty area and a 10 minute drive into Newport and all the good restaurants. Our experience has varied depending if it's a weekday or the weekend. Weekdays are quiet. Weekends are for the young party crowd mostly. Check-in line on the weekend was long but went quickly. Staff has always been nice and they always acknowledge my Marriott elite status and
Manager Response: Dear lozaman,  Welcome back to the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview! We love it when guests return because their previous stay was so great. Your compliments were a pleasure to read, and we are delighted you were pleased with your room and our service. Thank you for making us your preferred choice on every visit and we hope to see you and your wife again soon.  Charles Cho  General Manager

Summary: Covid: The hotel was packed this Saturday, with many guests not wearing masks. The next day, a manager - not wearing  a mask - walked the lobby asking how we were.   Noise: People were literally running the hallways late Saturday night, yelling after their friends. That said, if you close the doors to the bedroom and keep the windows closed, the only thing you hear is the highway traffic, which during the night was minimal.  Service: there was only one person at checkin on a very busy Saturday night, and no luggage carts. The woman at the desk was helpful, friendly, and calm, however.  Room: a bit dowdy, but the bed was comfortable, and the shower was hot. The room smelled of fragrance, like seemingly all hotels these days.
Manager Response: Dear mejiro,   Thank you for being our guest and taking the time to comment on your stay. We are glad that you had an overall good stay, but we regret not meeting all of your expectations. Providing a trustworthy and safe environment for our guests has been and continues to be a top priority for us, particularly during this rapidly changing time. We appreciate you bringing these concerns to our attention.  It was our pleasure serving you, and we hope you will give us another opportunity to make your next visit with us perfect.  Charles Cho  General Manager

Summary: I was incredibly impressed with my stay at this property. It began with the amazing service I received at check in by Hannah and a very kind gentleman whose name escapes me. Because it wasn’t so busy they were able to accommodate a bayview room which I was very grateful for. It was beautiful, clean, and spacious. With the immense pressure hotels are under at this time to operate with minimal resources and immense regulation I was happy to see the pool open, as well as a takeout dining option available. If you stay be sure to walk the trail at the backbay across the street in the morning!
Manager Response: Dear sassafrass1018,  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. Thank you for recognizing Hannah and for your kind compliments. We will share your feedback with our staff as a reminder that their efforts do not go unnoticed. We appreciate having you as our guest, and we look forward to having the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.  Charles Cho  General Manager

Summary Heading: Newport Beach Marriott Bayview 500 Bayview Cir, Newport Beach, CA 92660-2933
Summary: The room was pretty clean but there were some issues with the amenities. The suite has no microwave, no coffee pot, and no safe. There is only one small sink for the entire suite. There is no door separating the toilet, shower, and bathtub. The phone in the suite worked intermittently. The gym is closed on weekends because they do not have anybody to clean it on Saturday and Sunday. REALLY. When we checked out we had to wait over a half hour to get a luggage cart. There are other Marriott hotels in better locations.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to post a review. We want to provide every guest with a relaxing, comfortable stay; therefore, we are genuinely disappointed if this was not your experience. We regret any difficulties you had as some of our amenities not being available during your visit due to the current circumstances. We appreciate your patience and understanding as we have had to change some of our policies during these challenging times.   We also apologize for the delay you experienced at the time of check-out. We will share your feedback with our team, and we hope you will consider a return visit so we can show you we are devoted to giving each guest a great experience.  Charles Cho, General Manager

Summary Heading: Good hotel with a very bad sofa bed
Summary: Location is great with access to the newport bay trail. They do charge for daily parking. Everything is typical Marriott quality with one exception. We had a room with king bed and a sofa bed. Sofa bed was the worst ever. OMG, was it bad!! My 9-year old girl said she could fee the spring. Don’t stay at this hotel if you expect to use the sofa bed.
Manager Response: Dear EarthSpinner,  Thank you for reviewing your stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are glad overall you had a good time with us and loved our convenient location. However, we are sorry for your disappointment with the sofa bed in your room. We wish we could have had the opportunity to address your concerns while you were still here. We hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can provide you with the perfect stay you should always expect from us.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: I waited almost 4 weeks to write this in hopes it would be more accurate than angry. My son got married in September & he & his new wife were just returning to work from Covid lay-offs. A two day stay was all the time they could be away, but a mini honeymoon was going to have to be enough.  I made the reservation online & a few days before they were to arrive I called to order champagne to be waiting in their room. The girl said I needed to present my card in person to pay for the room. We made a quick 40 mile drive that evening & the assistant manager Hannah ran my card & said it was paid for. She assured me they could add charges to the room from the restaurant & bar.  After a beautiful wedding they went to their quick getaway.  The next evening my son called for room service.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback, I sincerely apologize for the delay in mailing you the certificate, and for what did not go right during your Son's stay. please feel free to reach out to me directly at Anthony.elsisi@marriott.com with any concerns.

Summary: From start to finish, the hotel was great. Yes, it’s terrible to be traveling during COVID, but the hotel is making the best of it by providing kind and understanding service.  THU at the registration desk was amazing— after explaining we were here for a much needed away-from-the-kids staycation, she upgraded us to a higher floor corner King room that was incredibly quiet and still had a great view of the bay. She was also so personable and made us feel extremely welcome. Just a tip: that if you enter a room and decide it’s not what you want, due to COVID guidelines, you may not be able to move to another room. Luckily we switched rooms right at registration.
Manager Response: Dear Jamarama3,   Thank you for choosing Newport Beach Marriott Bayview for a relaxing getaway, and we appreciate your excellent review. We are elated to know you loved our property and the superior service provided by Thu. Your compliments will be shared with her to recognize her for taking such great care of you. It is also a pleasure to read you were thoroughly pleased with your tranquil room and the spectacular bay views it offers. We value your business and look forward to your next visit.   Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Families come here on Friday and Saturday for short getaways so pool is packed and food choices limited. To check-in you leave your name and check back periodically to see if they have a room ready. Why not take your cellphone number and on a first come first served basis call when ready? Have a number for take-out and order from your room and they ring your room when your food is ready???
Manager Response: Dear ColoradoAztec52,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your stay with us. We are sorry for any inconvenience you may have endured at our pool area and apologize that your room was not ready for you when you arrived. We understand the frustration at having to wait until your room was made available to you. We appreciate your feedback and will use it to help us better our guest services. We look forward to your next visit and promise to make it outstanding in every aspect.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: We moved our daughter into her dorm at Orange Coast College and picked this hotel since my brother lives in Newport Beach  (he lives just the down the street) recommends it. The King Bayview suite is very comfortable. Plenty of space.The balcony overlooking the trail and bay is nice. Our room,411,overlooks the pool too. The bar/kitchen is take out only and I think open only until 8:30pm. The pool closes at 6pm,no gym but 20 miles of trails outside your doorstep. They have a few cruisers you can borrow. I had a turkey burger from their cafe. It was plain but fries were delicious. We’ll stay here again when we come up and visit.
Manager Response: Dear V7228LPjills,  Thank you for letting us know you had a pleasant stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are glad you loved your spacious suite with energizing views and that our location was perfect for your needs. We are also happy to read you liked the fries we offer. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back soon.    Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Very friendly at front desk. Let people bring bikes to rooms which I appreciated because of how often bikes get stolen. Restaurant is take away only (but you can dine at tables provided as normal) but no glass and you have to order food with alcohol.   They work with you if you leave the tab open.  The normal menu for food is gone and its a very limited menu and a 10 to 15 min wait even for hotdog or chicken tenders.  I dont blame the employees as they are just severely understaffed.  The restaurant/bar employees are working hard and non stop but its hard to manage this.  We went to Shirley's Bagels (about a 6 min bike ride or 12 min walk) for breakfast.  See pic for pandemic breakfast menu.
Manager Response: Dear S0CalTravelL0ver,  Thank you for staying at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are glad you were impressed with the service provided by our front desk associates. However, we regret any disappointment with some of our services not being available due to the current circumstances. We sincerely appreciate your understanding in this unprecedented time we all are going through and hope to welcome you back under better conditions so that you can enjoy everything we have to offer.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: A few friends and I stayed at this property for 2 nights to celebrate our friend's birthday, and can definitely say we were well taken care of and enjoyed our experience. We checked in on a busy Saturday with Anthony who was very poised, friendly, and welcoming despite it being his first day at the property. He gave us an early check in, as well as managed to find two rooms next to each other which helped so much in having time to set up the birthday surprise for our friend. Anthony also took the time to provide us with the details of hotel amenities and hours, assist in finding a luggage cart since they were all in use, and made sure to let us know he was available should we have any other questions or needs. We also had the pleasure of interacting with Thu and Ana during our
Manager Response: Dear E2593LHarielg,   Thank you for choosing Newport Beach Marriott Bayview for celebrating your friend’s birthday, and we appreciate your heartwarming review. Our staff works hard to make sure that every event is special for our guests, so we are pleased that the impeccable service provided by our associates surpassed your expectations. Your compliments will be shared with Anthony, Thu, and Ana to recognize them for taking such excellent care of you and your friends. We appreciate you recommending us to your family and friends, and we look forward to hosting you all again for another stellar experience.   Charles Cho General Manager

Summary Heading: Full Price Hotel - Half Price Experience
Summary: I have continued traveling throughout the pandemic staying exclusively at Marriott properties on 3 continents and multiple states and cities. This is by far the worst offender for a property using Covid as an excuse to cut costs yet still charge full price. At over $300 a night plus $30 parking you would be amazed the lack of amenities and services, unrelated to Covid, that this hotel has chosen to forego. No room service. No glasses or cups in your room. You want them? "It's a 1 hour wait to get them delivered, come to front desk for your plastic cups." To make a long story short AVOID this property until they restore themselves to a full service Marriot. This hotel is woefully understaffed in what can only be described as a cost cutting measure while still expecting their
Manager Response: Dear jaredb692,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. First of all, we appreciate your loyalty to the Marriott brand. As an experienced traveler, we know you travel to a lot of places, and we apologize for not meeting your expectations and for not living up to the standards you expect from us. We regret your disappointment with some of our amenities and services not being available due to the current circumstances. In compliance with local legislation and current health authority guidance, we have reduced our services in the best interest of our guests and associates. Please know these changes are temporary, and we look forward to reinstating our amenities and services as soon as possible. We are grateful for your feedback, and we hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back and provide you with a favorable impression of our hotel.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Trip Date August 8th-9th My family and friends decided to take a small get away and this was the perfect distance from the beach.   After not being able to find beach parking we quickly decided to just check into our hotel.  From start to finish the check in was quick and easy even though there was a long line of people trying to check in.  My  colleague had been in contact via phone with front office staff Hannah to ensure all of our preferences were put in prior to arrival.  The front off Manager Amjad was very helpful along with another front office staff member (tall, blonde, and charming I feel bad I didn't get her name. The stay was wonderful, the rooms was spacious enough to accommodate the party size we had.  The pool was just what we needed and the towel service there
Manager Response: Dear Peter_palo3,  We are pleased you loved your stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. Thank you for recognizing Hannah, Amjad, Sky, and for your gracious compliments. We will share your feedback with them as a reminder that their efforts do not go unnoticed. It is also nice to know that you enjoyed our modern and refreshing accommodations. We appreciate having you all as our guest and look forward to your return visit.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Though this is a suite hotel, the rooms are very dated and tired and need updating, but in addition to that, our experience was miserable! We were awakened both nights by people in the room next to us. The first night the noise came from a group of kids who were having a party in the room next to us. The second night, it was from a married couple having a serious argument and screaming at each other at 3:30 in the morning. We didn't sleep well either of the nights we were there and couldn't wait to check into a different hotel. My suggestion is to stay elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear JRH949,  Thank you for the honest review and for choosing our hotel. We are sorry your sleep was disturbed by noise from nearby guests. Our front desk is available 24 hours a day to resolve issues such as this, so we would have been happy to place you in another room had you alerted us. We are always looking for ways to improve, and your comments regarding the overall condition of our accommodations have been noted as we plan for future modernization. We hope you will come back to visit us as we would love to provide you with a better experience and a peaceful night's rest.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: We stayed here 7 nights and loved the hotel. They are practicing COVID-19 social distancing, require a mask inside the hotel, elevators require one group at a time, and on multiple night stays they will not enter your room to clean but you can obtain extra towels, shampoo, blankets from the front desk. Nice hotel, the rooms are suites...a bedroom and living room. The king bed was nice and comfortable and the Murphy bed was comfy as well. Pool was great. Nice view of the back bay with a trail (walking, jogging, horse riders)  right in front of the hotel by the bay. This felt like a safe area. The parking was expensive at $33/night and that is the reason for the 4 out of 5 ranking.
Manager Response: Dear AZMesaFamily,   Thank you for your generous review of Newport Beach Marriott Bayview and for letting us know you were impressed with our vibrant location and scenic bay views. Our top priority is to take care of our guests, and we are glad you acknowledged our commitment in maintaining a clean and safe environment. We enjoyed reading your comments about our all-suite accommodations, all of which feature luxury amenities like marble bathrooms and sumptuous bedding. It is also a pleasure to read that you loved our refreshing property and inviting pool. However, we regret that you were unhappy with our parking fee. We value your feedback and hope to welcome you again in the future.   Charles Cho General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect for a hotel, for a Marriott
Summary: A fine view of the water. Plenty of room and activities for a couple of family. Cook if you like or go out. Walk, pool, tennis, hot tub or bike. Can get busy.   Be sure to take a long walk in park along the ocean.

We had reservations at the Marriott Bayview for Saturday April 18, 2020.  We called Marriott’s central reservation number to confirm, and were assured that we were all set. We arrived at the hotel on the 18th and discovered it has been closed since April 10. We never received any communication about the closure, and our reservation on the Bonvoy website shows as “in process”.  Thankfully, an outstanding agent was able to get us a room at the nearby Newport Beach resort. But there is no excuse for the disappointment and anxiety we dealt with when we found the hotel closed.

Stayed Friday and Saturday. Nice hotel, the rooms are suites..a bedroom and living room. 9 floors, nice pool, fitness room is very nice, they even have a peloton bike. Breakfast buffet was great. Omelettes made to order..delicious! 10-15 mins from the beach. No concierge level. Onsite parking ..$33/night - a little expense for parking.  Very friendly front desk.
Manager Response: Dear scubaspice,  Thank you for choosing the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview for your weekend stay. We are thrilled to know you had a great experience and that you loved your suite, our well-equipped fitness center, the delicious breakfast buffet, and our cordial front desk team. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to doing so again!  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: The room was nice. It was large and has a separate room for the king bed. But that king bed was horrible!!! So uncomfortable. And the walls were so thin I could hear everything in the next room! Won’t stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear slkoc75,  Thank you for staying at our hotel and for your candid feedback. It is always our goal for every guest to have a comfortable stay and to get a restful night’s sleep. We are sorry we fell short of providing this for you due to the bed and noise issues you encountered. Our front desk associates are happy to tend to our guests' needs and would have done their best to move you to another room at your request. Please know that we continually work to improve our accommodations; therefore we greatly appreciate your comments. We hope that you will reconsider staying with us again. It would be our pleasure to provide you the relaxing stay you deserve.   Charles Cho General Manager

Summary Heading: Spent four nights in February and had most enjoyable stay
Summary: Titanium breakfast upgrade was $8 and so worth it. Breakfast chef made most any request amazing. Only downside was self park for $33. Ask for bayside view top floor, even though “Bayside” is somewhat questionable, certainly not Newport Bay. Great location even though nothing within walking distance but South Coast Plaza, Fashion Island, Balboa and Corona Del Mar are all with in minutes. Solid property
Manager Response: As a member of Marriott Bonvoy, we appreciate your loyalty to our brands, and we are glad we could welcome you to the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We thank you for mentioning how much you enjoyed our location and breakfast.  It is good to know the majority of your visit was pleasant, and we appreciate all of your feedback. We hope we will be the first hotel you think of on future trips to the city.  Charles Cho, General Manager

Summary: This is a nice hotel, close to John Wayne Airport and many restaurants within a short Uber/Lyft ride. We stayed on 6th floor facing the pool, barely heard the plans taking off. Check-in was fast due to pre-check in on the Bonvoy app. Parking fee is a bit steep but at least this resort does not charge the ridiculous resort fee like the other hotels that are closer to the beach. You will not be disappointed with a stay here.
Manager Response: Dear SKL-23,  Thank you for your kind review and for all the wonderful things that you had to say about Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are glad to know you found our location close to the John Wayne Airport to be perfect for your needs and also appreciated our pre-check on the Marriott Bonvoy App. We look forward to your next visit.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Thought was going to be a nice quiet hotel .....until 7 am everyday when the planes start taking off - the physical hotel is nice. Food in restaurant is excellent- as is the one man that was always there working.  There were several fees that I’m not used to. A different rate for ea night we were there- Sunday being the most expensive. The $14.95 internet charge because we booked through a travel agent. There was a washer and dryer in an alcove(no door) across from our room that someone started doing laundry at 5 am... so much for trying to sleep there  Going to another hotel next trip to California without any hesitation
Manager Response: Dear donnatZ119DY,  Thank you for choosing our hotel and taking the time to rate your stay. Although we are glad you liked the restaurant food, we are sorry we did not live up to your expectations otherwise. We hope you will give us another chance to provide you with the excellent service you should always expect from us. Please accept our apologies for the problems that inconvenienced you and impacted your rating.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: I had an excellent stay at this Marriott property. The grounds were nice and the hotel lobby was very inviting. During my stay the staff was very accommodating and friendly. I found the hotel to be very clean with modern upgrades. There were no businesses or restaurants within walking distance but driving to them only 5 minutes. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because this Marriott property did not have a concierge lounge. So that means no free breakfast or hors d’oeuvres. The front desk did offer me a free continental breakfast in its place but in order to make it a hot breakfast I had to pay 8 dollars more. I’ve never heard of this before. Usually you get the free hot breakfast at a Marriott property that does not have a lounge. Oh well, still a nice place. I would
Manager Response: Dear rricemd,  Thank you for being our guest at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are thrilled to know you had an enjoyable stay and that you appreciated our inviting lobby, beautiful grounds, helpful staff, and the clean, elegant property. We loved hosting you and hope we will continue to be your hotel of choice when your plans bring you back to the area.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: This hotel is breathtaking. Thanks to the front desk for choosing our room on the 9th floor. The rooms are beautiful, lovely suite for entertaining family. Bedroom has a separate door, huge king bed slept like a baby with added touch of dream sleep pillow spray. Bathroom separates into a separate sink / closet section and perfect for added privacy with doors between.  Comfy couch and seating and spacious refrigerator bar area. Handicapped friendly too!  Humungous tv to watch the Oscars.   The most amazing staff person here 😉 is Eddie. He helped us unload the car, helping my handicapped husband get around the hotel. We celebrated a birthday so directions to the grocery store. Unloaded everything in the room, and brought dishes utensils napkins etc plus stored the ice cream
Manager Response: Dear trish9252017,  Thank you for your review and for all the wonderful things that you had to say about Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. Our picturesque location overlooking Upper Newport Bay Nature Preserve is the perfect place to recharge! We enjoyed reading your comments about our all-suite accommodations, all of which feature luxury amenities like marble bathrooms and sumptuous bedding. We are also delighted to know you and your husband had a comfortable stay and that you were impressed with the service provided by our dedicated associates. We will surely share your compliments with our team, especially Eddie. We wish you all the best with your travels, and we look forward to welcoming you again so we can enjoy everything we have to offer!  Charles Cho  General Manager

Summary Heading: Wonderful location near John Wayne airport
Summary: I occasionally accompany my husband on his business trips and had a very nice experience at this hotel. We have stayed at the nearby Renaissance in the past but this hotel is hands down the better choice for several reasons. The staff at the Marriott Bayview is much friendlier than at the Renaissance and provided excellent service at both check-in and restaurant. The hotel is located near a wonderful walking trail and we loved the large Suite rooms. The food was delicious and the ambience is quaint but perfect for a relaxing trip. We will stay here when traveling to Orange County from now on as it seems to be a well kept secret!
Manager Response: Dear AprBee,  Thank you for taking the time to post your comments regarding your recent stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. Your compliments were a pleasure to read, and we are delighted you were thoroughly spoiled by our team. We will be sure to share your fantastic compliments with the entire staff. It was also a pleasure reading how much you loved our convenient location and quality food. We appreciate your review and look forward to having both of you as our guest again.  Charles Cho  General Manager

Summary Heading: A bit below that standard I expect from Marriott
Summary: This is not a property I will stay at again. I stayed in room 325. The bathroom has a door from the main living area, and another from the bedroom which is separated by a heavy pocket door that does not slide easily.  The shower is small. The bed was relatively comfortable but did not have overly nice sheets. The vanity area has carpet which I find unsanitary. The balcony is very narrow, no room for a chair, but does look over the  little bay area. Overall I found the room a bit tired. The outside common area did look quite nice.  On my first night in the LA area I stayed at the Avenue of the Arts Costa Mesa (another Marriott property) and had a MUCH nicer experience. I would recommend going there instead.
Manager Response: Dear  Sherrylynn W,  Thank you for staying at the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We appreciate your detailed and honest review and apologize that your room didn't meet up with your expectations. We are always looking for ways to improve, and your comments have been noted for our plans in developing the property. We are grateful for your business and loyalty to the Marriott brand, and we hope that you reconsider in the future and give us another chance to give you the accommodations you should always come to expect from us.  Charles Cho  General Manager

Summary: Great location, safe area, near the beach and fashion island (drive away). We ended up with a huge suite which was awesome but unfortunately WiFi isn’t included unless you’re a Marriott member so we became one. Good beds, clean room, nice lobby (infused water available until 11pm), no complaints! I would stay here again but next time I want to stay at the beach!!
Manager Response: Dear dulcevidadesofia,  Thank you for your positive feedback about the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We appreciate you mentioning how much you enjoyed your luxurious, all-suite accommodations and our location. Our hotel gives guests the option to explore local attractions like Balboa Pier and Fashion Island, or spend time soaking up the sun at one of the area's many beautiful beaches. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary Heading: Newport Beach Marriott Bayview-  A Hidden Gem
Summary: I was pleasantly surprised with my stay at the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. The rate was very low in December and I ended up getting a nice bay view suite. The grounds are beautiful and there is a large pool, jacuzzi and gym. The restaurant is small and expensive but the food is good. Walter, one of the waiters, was very nice and friendly which made dining more special.  The location is right near the freeway, Fashion Island Mall, and Balboa. Overall, a good choice for a Newport Beach hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Mike D,  Thank you for staying at the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are delighted you loved the views from your room and that you enjoyed your dining experience at our restaurant, especially because of Walter. Your praises about our thoughtful amenities and location close to local attractions like Balboa Pier and Fashion Island are a pleasure to read. We are grateful for your kind comments and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: I recently stayed at the Newport Beach Marriott Hotel and had a welcoming experience. There are lots of amenities here that are nice but for me the best part of the experience was the excellent staff. Hannah & Nichole at the front desk were very kind, and made my experience at the Marriott an experience that I will never forget. I didn’t feel like just another hotel guest, but rather a friend.
Manager Response: Dear erikal762,  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. Thank you for recognizing Hannah & Nichole and for your kind compliments. We will share your feedback with them as a reminder that their efforts do not go unnoticed. We appreciate having you as our guest, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.  Charles Cho  General Manager

Summary: This hotel has a great staff, super close to the airport, and a great restaurant. Downside: on top of a major intersection that flows through the heart of Newport Beach - if you are on the end of the hotel closest to the intersection, it is extremely loud all night as trucks pull up and pull away from the intersection and people joy-riding gun their engines. The rooms are spacious but if you have any issues with being a light sleeper, book at your own risk.
Manager Response: Dear Chefsfan,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate your kind comments about our great location and fantastic dining option. Guests love that we are close to many local attractions as well as beautiful beaches. We pride ourselves on delivering a pleasant hotel experience, therefore we are truly sorry that the noise from outside traffic prevented you from getting a good night's sleep. Our front desk is always happy to address your concerns when given the opportunity, so we ask that you please do not hesitate to contact us if you encounter this again. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope to see you again on your next visit to our area.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Wouldn’t you think a room called a Bayview King Suit with balcony would have a bayview with a balcony??  Not here!  Barely a Juliette balcony and no bay view?  View of a parking garage!  And I’m a “Bonvoy” member!  Free internet!  Woo hoo!  That said, simple restaurant has good food and lovely service!   Newport Beach really has no great hotels. Stayed at all of them - Hyatt Newporter, old Four Seasons.  Go south to Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Dear Tim C,  First and foremost, thanks for your loyalty to our hotels and for being a Bonvoy member. We sincerely apologize for not meeting your expectations during your recent visit with us. We are known for our exceptional service and attention to detail, and we regret this was not your experience. We wish you luck in your future travels.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Very good location and a very nice comfortable hotel. Had great food (beef stew) and good IPAs. Good conference facilities and outdoor areas where we continued some meeting discussions. Nice pool area and well equipped gym.
Manager Response: Dear T6891EKmattc,  We are glad your conference brought you to the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. It is wonderful to know you enjoyed our delicious beef stew and had a great experience at our pool area and fitness center. With our flexible, upscale accommodations and central location, our goal is to make sure every event we host is outstanding. We are thrilled to learn we met that expectation for you, and we hope to have the pleasure of a return visit soon.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Great room (King Suite) Great Location. Room was quiet even with the airport so close, location great even the room service was wonderful!  Nothing even remotely bad to say about this trip other than  I wish my stay had been longer!
Manager Response: Dear CharmedItaly2005,  Thank you for your review and for all the wonderful things that you had to say about Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. Our picturesque location overlooking Upper Newport Bay Nature Preserve is the perfect place to recharge! We are thrilled knowing you loved the comforts of your room and the exceptional room service that made your stay with us even better. Your comments were a pleasure to read, and we are excited to share them with our outstanding staff. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Spent a couple of nights at the Marriott Bayview last week and had a relaxing time.  It's in a lovely residential area; seems like a lot of exclusive condo buildings around. Didn't need assistance but there was no curbside staff. Self-parking only but it's easy all-exterior, ground-level. (I'm platinum elite status, but at the registration desk, I was told everyone pays $33.00 per night, despite lower fees indicated on the check-in mobile app. That info needs to be updated.) There is a parking structure right across the street, and I understand that the rates are lower. All rooms are suites. Decor is a bit outdated but well-maintained and the French doors between the living room and bedroom are a nice touch. Very comfortable beds. The bathroom is large and has an updated look.
Manager Response: Dear Dylanite,  As a member of Marriott Bonvoy Platinum Elite member, we are glad we could welcome you to the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are pleased you liked our solicitous staff, comfortable accommodations and that our location was ideal for your plans. However, we are sorry for falling short in some of your expectations. We will address your remarks with our staff. Your feedback will help us as we work to improve our service and refine the guest experience. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Very disappointed from arrival onward.  There are no bellmen to greet or handle your luggage - you carry your bags.  There is no valet service to park your car.  For ONLY $38 per night you can park your car yourself. The view of the back bay was very nice.  The room was clean and well maintained.  However, there are no safes in the room - take your jewelry down stairs if you want to lock it up.  There are no robes available.  There is one sink with no room to put your toiletries out for a man, much less a woman.  There was a huge stain on the bed cover - can’t tell if it is a scorch mark or a pee stain.  This hotel is a total disappointment and not 4 star by any means.
Manager Response: Dear Marshall w,  Thank you for choosing our resort and for sharing your observations. We are sorry we did not live up to your expectations during your visit. Your feedback is essential, so we appreciate you bringing these issues to our attention and hope you will give us an opportunity to provide you with a better stay on your next trip.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Nothing special about this place...from the service to the room everything was very average. There is not valet parking, nor does the gentleman at the check-in area of the driveway remove your bags from the car. We pulled up and he hurriedly instructed us just to get to the parking lot. We had to quickly remove the bags ourselves and get them into the hotel. Parking was a pain in the neck. There is a barrier arm at the entrance and exit to the lot. When we were leaving for dinner the arm would not lift up for us to exit and we ended up being late for dinner. It seems like this is a hotel where newly hired staff are trained before being sent to a nicer property. They were friendly, but not very seasoned. Personally, I will never stay here again. Rooms were fine, strange layout in
Manager Response: Dear KMM043,  We appreciate the detailed and candid feedback about your stay with us. We are always looking for ways to improve, and your comments have been noted for our plans in developing the property and staff. We apologize for not meeting your expectations, and we are grateful for your business. We hope to welcome you again in the future.  Charles Cho  General Manager

Summary Heading: Great room with a fantastic view.
Summary: I road tripped down to OC for my HS friends' wedding at the UCI University Club October 6th, 2019. I stayed in a king suite with "bay view." It was spacious, well laid out and the views were awesome. Understanding it was not the ocean but close to one, the water views did not disappoint from my room (411). Check in was friendly and easy, parking was not included in the price but compared to other local hotels, this one was cheaper room rates for the amenities so it made up for it.   I only had one annoyance at checkout, I paid the whole bill and parking and the guy at the desk had me keep my key to get the gate to open for my car on the way out but that it was all paid for. I got to the gate, waved my key and the gate wouldn't open. It asked me for $33 more dollars. I had
Manager Response: Dear RWheeler82,  Thank you for making Newport Beach Marriott Bayview a part of your travel plans. We enjoyed reading your comments about our all-suite accommodations, all of which feature luxury amenities like marble bathrooms and sumptuous bedding. We are glad to know how much you loved the mesmerizing views of the bay from your room and had a comfortable experience. We look forward to your return visit.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Attended the annual fire & lifeguard awards dinner in the rose garden. The event was absolutely beautiful and the service was amazing. Food was delicious. Also Justin in the valet offered excellent service directing us where to go and had are car ready right when we walked up. Would definitely come back to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Evetto13,  Thank you for being our guest while you were here to attend Annual Fire & Lifeguard awards dinner. It is wonderful to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your visit to Newport Beach Marriott Bayview and that our food offerings delighted your taste buds. We are also glad that you were impressed with the attentive service provided by Justin. We will surely share your compliments with him. We look forward to welcoming you again soon.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: While I was a bit disappointed that the “view of the bay” was limited, hotel was clean and comfortable. Kudos to the staff for exceptional hospitality. A shout out to Eddie - if you order room service, you just might encounter him. Impeccable service with a smile.
Manager Response: Dear tanglejig,  Thank you for taking the time to post your comments regarding your recent stay at the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. Your positive words about our beautiful property were a pleasure to read, and we are delighted you were thoroughly spoiled by our team. We will be sure to share your fantastic compliments with our devoted associates, especially Eddie. We appreciate all of your helpful feedback and look forward to having you as our guest again.  Charles Cho  General Manager

Summary Heading: Large rooms, comfy bed, fantastic front desk service
Summary: We stayed here for a weekend getaway to Newport Beach.  Right off the bat we were impressed by the friendly and professional front desk staff and by the beautifully decorated hotel lobby.  Our room was on the 4th floor and we had great views of the bay and the walking trail.  There is lots to do in the area, whether you come here for shopping, dining, beach, hiking, or biking. Everything is within minutes.   We had no complains about the room, everything was great, clean, comfortable bed, nice sitting area and a mini fridge in the room.  The only concern was a loud elevator that made a rattling noise when it was in use.  Not a huge deal since by night time things quieted down.  And I also have to agree with another reviewer who mentioned lack of counter space by the bathroom
Manager Response: Dear Alisa B,  Thank you for your detailed review about your stay at the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We appreciate your great feedback and are delighted to know that you loved our convenient location, spacious accommodations, and seamless service. It was a pleasure serving you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon for another outstanding stay.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Perched above Jamboree Road and the upper Newport Bay Nature Preserve, also known as Back Bay, is the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview, an all-suites hotel and business center.  We stayed in a one bedroom suite on the 6th floor with a bay view that was stunning.  The suites are nicely appointed and clean with an over-sized restroom that had a shower stall and separate bath tub, unusual to see these days.  We booked with our AAA status and got a great rate that included daily parking and breakfast at the on site Vista Kitchen & Bar (daily parking is $35. and the breakfast buffet costs $30. per person).  So, if you a AAA member and the discount rate is available, grab it!  We noticed a lot of guests were parking off street in the neighborhood to avoid the daily parking fee.  The
Manager Response: Dear marhow2001,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We enjoyed reading your comments about our all-suite accommodations, all of which feature marble bathrooms, sumptuous bedding, beautiful views of our surroundings, and so much more. It was also a pleasure knowing you liked our quality breakfast offerings, relaxing poolside, and cordial associates as well. However, we are sorry for the noise disturbances that inconvenienced you and are grateful for your valuable feedback. We wish you all the best with your travels, and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Charles Cho  General Manager

Summary: We stayed in the Marriott Bay View.  The rooms were nice.  Food very expensive.  The hotel's location is okay and fairly central to most destination points.  There are plenty of nice restaurants up and down the coast.  If you want to see beautiful sunsets, the restaurants on the Pacific Coast Highway are the best.  We dinned at a beach front restaurant named The Cliff in Laguna.
Manager Response: Dear suzithehunter5,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are happy to read you liked our excellent location close to everything the city has to offer, including many good dining options and local attractions. It was also a pleasure knowing you enjoyed our comfortable accommodations. We appreciate all of your valuable feedback. Thank you once more for the gracious rating, and we hope to see you again soon.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Just stayed there for 3 days , they cut corners there and try to hit you very every expense they can.  Booked 2 King beds when arrived they didn’t have and try to sell me on an upgrade with pull out bed for additional cost and it was a light sleeper room, for those who don’t know what that means like me it means this room is next to elevators and if your a light sleeper you will get no sleep my question is why even give this room out when people have such a short stay.  Internet should not be $14 a day that takes nerve to charge that.  And this might sound odd but check out the cheap toilet paper they use it’s like sandpaper for all most $300 a night they should Be ashamed to treat customers like that and please for future clients complain against that rip off fee for internet
Manager Response: Dear JosephS3583,  Thank you for being our guest and sharing your experiencing. Please accept our sincere apology for not meeting your expectations regarding your room type request. We try to honor all room requests, but there are times when we simply do not have the room unoccupied and available. We know this was disappointing, and we are truly sorry.   We are committed to providing a comfortable stay with exceptional service, and we hope to have an opportunity to better your experience with us whenever your travels bring you back to the area.  We encourage our guests to participate in our Marriott Bonvoy Rewards program to enjoy exclusive perks which include member-only rates and free internet. Signing up is free and simple and this will allow you to begin earning points and taking advantage of these many benefits, including free Wi-Fi, when you book direct.  Thank you for your observations concerning areas where we can focus our improvement efforts, we will share these with the appropriate individuals.  While we did not meet your expectations on this visit, it is our hope you will give us another opportunity to regain your confidence in the future.   Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Very clean and comfortable. Loved the fact there are more than 12 miles of hiking, biking trails just steps from the Hotel. Service was great and the staff was very friendly. Every room is a suite with a fridge and coffee/ tea maker. High cost to park or eat there.
Manager Response: Dear valleysteve,  Thank you so much for your awesome review of Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. Located on the bay, we combine outstanding service and accommodations with convenient access to top California coastal towns like Huntington Beach and Laguna Beach. We are delighted your stay was perfect in every way, and we look forward to seeing you soon.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Wanted to stay in area close to hiking/walking and this location was perfect.  We were able to walk in the back bay estuary and it was lovely. Upon check in the staff was very friendly and welcoming.  Everyone we encountered (staff and guests) were very kind.  Our stay was enjoyable and we will be back.
Manager Response: Dear rahiker,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are delighted to know you found our location to be perfect for your trip and that you were impressed by our devoted staff. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we hope we will be the first hotel you and your family think of on future trips to the area.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: The hotel is quite nice. Spacious suite rooms. Bathroom seems a little outdated but was fine. Balcony. Used 35000 points per night. Not bad for the points needed. Nice pool. Platinum will get you a continental cold breakfast. If you want hot you have to pay $8 in addition to your coupon for being platinum. Should be included. Also parking is $30!!! Quite steep and no comp for being platinum like some hotels give. Close vicinity to beach and shopping.
Manager Response: Dear crystaldiannes,  Thank you for your review of Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are pleased to know how happy you were with our spacious accommodations, relaxing pools, and excellent location. As a Platinum member of Marriott Bonvoy, we truly appreciate your loyalty to our brands. It was a pleasure to host you, and we hope to have another opportunity to welcome you again soon.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent Marriott that is only Missing One Thing
Summary: The Newport Marriott Bayview is one of my last picks of the Marriott Brand in the Newport Beach area.  It is a fantastic hotel with lots of space in the rooms and excellent views of the Bay.  But there is one thing missing that would make this hotel complete.  They really need to consider putting in a concierge lounge or an M Club lounge for their Platinum and Titanium elite members.  I think that would attract more people to the hotel such as myself that go to other Marriott properties for those amenities.
