The people that work at this hotel are extremely nice and easy to deal with and the parking situation is much better than some of the other hotels in the area though it is still pricey Marriott parking.  Again bring in a lounge and this would move up to one of my first
Manager Response: Dear csnapp12,  As a member of Marriott Bonvoy, we appreciate your loyalty to our brands, and we are glad we could welcome you to the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. Thank you for mentioning how much you loved our spacious accommodations as well as the helpful staff. Your feedback is valuable to us, and we have taken a note of it. We wish you all the best with your travels, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Charles Cho General Manager

Summary Heading: Air B&B service at hotel prices
Summary: This is the fourth time I have stayed here. In the past, I would have given this property a 4 or 5. It is comfortable, arranged nicely and staff are well trained and pleasant. A recent change has changed my opinion. In the past, I opted to "save the environment" by opting not to have my sheets and towels changed daily. Now that has become NO housekeeping. I was here three days- wastebaskets not emptied, coffee fixings not replenished. The sink was draining slowly. The maintenance staff left the declogging agent on the sink and took the washcloth. My bill for this stay is near $700. For that, I shouldn't have to go downstairs to ask for coffee for the kureig or tip additionally and wait for it to be brought up and return to full wastebaskets. I don't know if this is a Marriott
Manager Response: Dear Alana S,   Thank you for being our guest again and sharing your experience. We regret that your stay did not meet your expectations. When you opt into our Green Choice program, it means you are opting out of all housekeeping. We will gladly empty trash and replenish supplies with a phone call to the front desk. We regret that this impacted your stay negatively and we do apologize that we were not more clear about what this program entails during your visit, and we will take better care to be more communicative in the future.   We appreciate your kind words regarding our staff and will share this with our team.  We hope you will give us another opportunity to have you as our guest. We are confident we can replace this experience with a much more positive memory!  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: I had a rough day at work and went to this Marriott Bayview to unwind and relax. I checked in at 10PM and shared my frustrations with Thu and Marllorit from the front desk, and they gave me a beautiful Bay View room. Marllorit was extremely personable as she emphasized with my situation. Talking to her instantly made my night better! I quickly dropped off my bags and ran to the in-house restaurant for dinner where I met Myles, the supervisor and Adelle, the bartender who served me. Both showed much professionalism as we were taking about funny work stories.   The wonderful staff made this not just a relaxing stay, but a memorable, very special stay that I will greatly cherish!
Manager Response: Dear IslandGirl1995,   Thank you for taking the time to post your gracious comments regarding your stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. Your compliments about our intimate staff were a pleasure to read, and we're delighted you were thoroughly spoiled by our team. We will be sure to share your fantastic compliments with the entire staff, especially Thu, Marllorit, Myles, and Adelle. We appreciate your review and look forward to having you as our guest again.  Charles Cho, General Manager

Summary: I unfortunately need to keep attending meetings at this hotel and though I rarely write a review, want to warn people away from this one if it is in your power to choose. I've stayed here half a dozen times and it is always such a disappointment, I want to list some of the issues:  1. Clearly designed by a man. There is no shelf or cupboard for toiletry bags and almost no space around the sink. 2. There is no make up mirror and the mirror is far away, making putting make up on difficult. 3. Things I don't pack - expecting them to be in hotels like a shower cap and ear buds - are not provided.  4. There is nothing in the room about the hotel - no room service menu. I stayed here twice before I realized they actually did have a fitness area. 5. I had the caesar salad last night
Manager Response: Dear turkkizi34,  Thank you for your review of your stay with us Having said that, we are truly sorry that you encountered several issues with your room and our hotel that left such a lasting impression on your visit. We appreciate you mentioning the issues you faced so we can ensure our team follows up to correct them however possible. We strive to ensure our guests are always in the best experience possible and in this case, it seems this was not done with much grace. We certainly understand how this could be a deterrent from what could have been a much better experience. We assure you, we will have this addressed with our team. While we know that does not negate the negative experience you had, it is our hope you will give us another opportunity when your travels bring you back to our city so we may have the chance to provide you with the excellent stay we are known for.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary Heading: We always stay at the Marrioitt Bayview when in Newport
Summary: We've stayed here many times over the years and prefer the Bayview's quiet, less-touristy, more adult,  professional atmosphere. Always are impressed with the staff. Stephen was charming and professional at Registration along with Mile as MOD. Enjoyed gettimg to know Walter our server out by the fire pits in the evening. Thanks for the great service Walter. And thanks to Danny and Nathan as well. See you all soon.
Manager Response: Dear ELunk,   We are glad to know we are your preferred choice whenever you are in Newport. We take great pride in delivering excellent service, so comments like yours let us know that we are meeting that goal. We enjoyed taking care of you, and we appreciate you recognizing our associates by name in your wonderful review. They are always so excited to receive compliments! Thank you for your repeat business, and we look forward to welcoming you again soon.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: This is my 4th stay and service is better each time. This is an all suite hotel, and having a huge living area and wetbar for the same price of a regular room is a bonus. But the service is what brings me back.  I woke up to a huge headache and went to buy aspirin at front desk. They could not help me as they had another guest going thru her bill. A staff member named Eddie from the Dining area saw I needed help and ran behind the desk to take care of me. As I thanked him and said, aspirin and coffee and I should be better- he ran back to the dining area and made me a cup of coffee.   People like Eddie are the hero’s of hospitality- and that’s what fosters loyalty.
Manager Response: Dear sbettencourt,  Thank you for choosing the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview once again and for your lovely review. Eddie is a valued member of our team, so it is no surprise he took such great care of you. That is what we like to see. Please be assured that we will pass along your comments to him. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Parking fee $32 - ridiculous  No lounge for elite members I wish I had more to say but this Marriott doesn’t qualify for a great review.  What’s the story with all these Marriott hotels in Orange county.  Seem like all Marriotts are a century behind all the other ones in other cities.
Manager Response: Dear CallmeRegi,  Thank you for choosing our hotel and taking the time to rate your stay. We are sorry we did not live up to your expectations, and we hope you will give us another chance to provide you with the excellent service you should always expect from us. We understand the lack of a lounge can be frustrating and we apologize for this inconvenience. Your feedback will be shared with the appropriate individuals as we are always evaluating ways to improve our guest experience.  Please accept our apologies for the impact these frustrations had on your stay. We hope to have another opportunity to serve you n the future so we may leave you with a better impression.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here for his birthday after a day in Catalina island! I let the front desks know we would be celebrating his birthday and they were so accommodating! Myles Thompson gave us a great room with a beautiful view and amazing restaurant recommendations! And to top it off Citally gave us a late check out! Staff was amazing and very accommodating!!!
Manager Response: Dear alyssaarce,  Thank you for choosing Newport Beach Marriott Bayview for your celebration. We are glad you had a fantastic stay.  We also appreciate you acknowledging our staff especially Myles and Citally for their fantastic service. It was a pleasure accommodating you, and we hope to see you again soon.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Very clean and quiet. The room had good heat. Very good bed bed. The lighting is good and there’s a desk if you need it. Room has a refrigerator. Nice seating in the room. Good pay parking adjacent to the hotel entrance.
Manager Response: Dear John R,  Thank you for the fantastic rating of Newport Beach Marriott Bayview! Located on the bay, we combine outstanding service and accommodations with convenient access to top California coastal towns like Huntington Beach and Laguna Beach. We are delighted your stay was perfect in every way, and we look forward to seeing you soon.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Stayed here on recent business trip.  Friendly service and clean rooms.  Great location if you have meetings in Irvine, Costa Mesa and Newport Beach area.  Enjoyed in-room breakfast; came hot and on time.  Easy parking.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear derekb2345678,   Thank you for the fantastic rating of Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. Located on the bay, we combine outstanding service and accommodations with convenient access to top California coastal towns like Irvine, Costa Mesa, and Newport Beach. We are delighted your business stay was perfect in every way, and we look forward to seeing you soon.  Charles Cho, General Manager

Summary: When my family arrived here we were excited.  The rooms were clean and even spacious.  Not over priced at all.  However there wasn’t much near the Hotel for us to do as a family.  Only a Mall near by.  We ended up at the Cheese Cake Factory in the Mall for a family “to do.”  If it we’re just my wife and I, staying on grounds would have been totally fine.
Manager Response: Dear sunni-ali,  We loved having you and your family at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are delighted that you enjoyed our spacious accommodations. Thank you for your feedback, and we hope to see you again soon.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: To start, I wasn’t recognized as a Marriott rewards memeber so I wasn’t told about how the WiFi works and didn’t get my bottled water.  It’s the smaller things like that I appreciate.  Also, the pictures online to me don’t match the hotel.  Our Bayview suite barely can see the water and it’s not impressive.  Request a room with a better view.  The rooms to me could use an update like removing the popcorn ceilings.  The bed is too hard that it hurt my back and the duvet and sheets were just awkward to keep on the bed.  I just feel let down by this location.
Manager Response: Dear Scott D,   First and foremost, thanks for your loyalty to our hotels. We sincerely apologize for not meeting your expectations. We are known for our exceptional service and attention to detail, and we regret this was not your experience. We have reviewed your comments with our team to correct and prevent these issues from repeating and we hope you can accept our apologies for your status not being acknowledged upon your arrival. We appreciate your feedback and will share your concerns regarding the bed and the room needing a refresh with the appropriate individuals in charge of our future projects and renovations.   While we were not able to meet your expectations on this visit, we hope you will give us another opportunity to regain your trust.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: We booked 3 rooms. The rooms a very large comfortable. I liked the separate bed room. All rooms are suites. The bathrooms are not update. I did wish the bathrooms were nicer and more updated. Prices were low. I would go back. Great location.
Manager Response: Dear Beverly K,  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are glad to read your compliments about our all-suite accommodations, which feature luxury amenities. It is also nice to know how much you liked our location and that you found us to be fairly priced. We truly appreciate your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Close to John Wayne airport, close to Newport Beach (it’s still Irvine...). Was a nice stay for 3 nights. Close to UCI where I had to be. Good view of the bay from my room/mini suite.  Unfortunately my wife got sick from the Protein Bowl. No idea what went wrong but it certainly ruined a nice Friday night date where I wanted to take her out to Newport Beach. Very sad! Good pool and outside stuff. Also, they rent bikes, even electric bikes. Nice for going around the Lagune.
Manager Response: Dear 819bernhardw,  Thank you for writing a review of your visit to Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. Our picturesque location overlooking Upper Newport Bay Nature Preserve is the perfect place to recharge, and we are glad that was the highlight of your stay. However, we are sorry for the unfortunate incident that took place and you were not able to have the enjoyable experience you expected. We appreciate your patience and hope to have another opportunity to welcome you and your wife back to our hotel.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Likes: The roomy rooms, comfortable and quiet. Location was very convenient to SNA airport and UC-Irvine campus.  Not like: I had a quite terrible meal at the restaurant, unfortunately. Service was very good but the food tasted bad.
Manager Response: Dear Esker4,  Thank you so much for choosing to stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are glad you enjoyed our ideal location and comfortable accommodations! Your feedback will be shared with our food and beverage team to see where we can make improvements. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary Heading: Enjoyed Our Visit, Would Stay Here Again
Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our visit here, the staff were all very friendly, from reception, to the restaurant and housecleaning, the outside area was small but well kept and very  attractive, the lobby was stylish and inviting. This is a relative small Marriott and we were pleased to find we could still get a meal at the restaurant late at night. We would stay here again but would mention that although the rooms are all suites they do look a little dated, particularly the bathroom which had a rather strange configuration, however we had a nice view and the rooms felt clean and comfortable. Parking is a little high at $30 per night but probably comparable with other hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Kathy J,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience of Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. It is nice to know how much you enjoyed your time at our hotel and that our staff left such a good impression on you. We also appreciate your constructive feedback about our rooms, and we look forward to seeing you on your next visit to this area.  Charles Cho  General Manager

Summary: Convenient location halfway between Newport Beach & John Wayne airport. Nice views & outdoors areas with fire pits. Gym is above average with nice pool & spa. Spacious rooms; restaurant and bar offered good food selection albeit a little overpriced
Manager Response: Dear Coastal54866227124,   Thank you for the fantastic review of Newport Beach Marriott Bayview! Located on the bay, we combine outstanding service and accommodations with convenient access to top California coastal towns like Huntington Beach and Laguna Beach. We are delighted your stay was perfect in every way, and we look forward to seeing you soon.  Charles Cho  General Manager

Summary Heading: Super comfortable and quiet suites. Top notch service. A fine place to stay.
Summary: The suites are spacious and quiet with superb bedding. Service is very good as is the wifi coverage.  We had the breakfast buffet with custom made omelettes and everything was just delicious.  Parking is expensive, but try to get it included in your room rate. The AAA rate includes parking and breakfast.  An excellent choice of accommodation in Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Waterloonie,  Thank you for the fantastic review of Newport Beach Marriott Bayview! Located on the bay, we combine outstanding service and accommodations with convenient access to top California coastal towns like Huntington Beach and Laguna Beach. We are delighted your stay was perfect in every way which earned us your recommendation. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Myself and 3 of my friends stayed at this resort as we celebrated 2 of our friends’ birthdays!  We booked 2 1 bedroom suites with a balcony.  The rooms were very spacious and had double French doors that blocked off the living room space from the bedroom space.  The hotel itself is centrally located near shops and restaurants in Newport Beach.  The staff were extremely friendly and service oriented.  They provided 2 complimentary plates of fruit, cheese and meat (1 for each of my friends) and a bottle of wine to help us celebrate the two birthdays.  The inside and outside of the hotel is beautiful!  I definitely would go back, in fact one of my friends and I will be staying there for New Years Eve and New Years Day!
Manager Response: Dear Glena242015,   Thank you for making Newport Beach Marriott Bayview a part of your friends birthday celebrations. Our picturesque location overlooking Upper Newport Bay Nature Preserve is the perfect place to recharge! Your comments were a pleasure to read, and we are excited to share them with our exceptional staff. Thanks again for your feedback, and we look forward to your next visit.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: We enjoyed staying here for suite room at Newport Beach.  Great location and easy to drive to the beach. My teenager 13 years old enjoyed his old sofa bed with private TV. Love option about 2 rooms suite connect to others.
Manager Response: Dear noic2015,   Thank you for the fantastic rating of Newport Beach Marriott Bayview! Located on the bay, we combine outstanding service and accommodations with convenient access to top California coastal towns like Huntington Beach and Laguna Beach. We are delighted your stay was perfect in every way, and we look forward to seeing you and your family soon.  Charles Cho  General Manager

Summary: This was my first time staying at this hotel.  The service from the staff was well above average and congrats to the hotel for strong training.  It's noticeable and I appreciated the great service.  The rooms however are a different story.  Very comfortable bed, but the rooms definitely need a refresh.  And by refresh, I mean the rooms need a total makeover with new furniture and if they really wanted to invest, new bathrooms too.  Room service good and fairly priced.  No issue with the parking, albeit high at $29.  What I didn't like was the $17 Kettle One cocktail.  That's way too expensive for a Marriott far away from any major city.  It made me feel gouged and not apt to return.  This is a hotel that caters to it's corporate crowd during the week and has a decent leisure
Manager Response: Dear EvanPSP,   Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  We appreciate the detailed feedback about your stay with us and for the kind comments about our service and staff.  We are always looking for ways to improve, and your comments regarding your room have been noted for our plans in developing the property. We apologize for not meeting your expectations, and we are grateful for your business.   We hope to welcome you again in the future.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: A very good place to stay when in Newport. Room lay-out was terrific with separate living and sleep space. The view over the bay is not the best we have seen, but the scenery is what it is. Pool are is OK as the gym and hot tub. The only disappointment is the ambiance of the restaurant. Food is absolutely OK but there is no coziness in the restaurant.
Manager Response: Dear bbjurstr,  Thank you for reviewing your stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are happy to know you were pleased with most aspects of our hotel and that you especially highlighted some of our key facilities. We value your feedback and look forward to your next trip very soon.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: A nice Marriott very close to the airport. The rooms were very spacious (it was like a suite) with nice amenities, views and plenty of space. Location was great to everything in the city - but maybe because of the closeness to airport the (self) parking cost is steep
Manager Response: Dear jubda,  Thank you so much for choosing to stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We appreciate you mentioning how much you enjoyed our comfortable accommodations with thoughtfully appointed amenities and that our location was convenient for you! We hope we will be the first hotel you think of on future trips to the area!  Charles Cho, General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice place that’s close to everything
Summary: Yes the hotel is starting to show age but not that bad as some have said.    I room was a mini suite and huge with a Bayview.    The resturant was good and Danny rocks.   Nice rate and no parking fee is a plus in the area.     Loved the fire pits at night.
Manager Response: Dear Dapger,  Thank you for your review about Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. Our picturesque location overlooking Upper Newport Bay Nature Preserve is the pleasant place to recharge! Thank you again for your feedback, and we look forward to your next visit very soon.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary Heading: Memorable for the extortionate parking fees!
Summary: We stayed as a family with two small children over the weekend. It is a fairly standard Marriott - decent sized rooms but a little dated and basic. Better suited for business travelers. Not really located close to anything - no restaurants or shops within walking distance.....all of which makes the daily parking charge of $29 even more curious. The explanation provided is that it is a business area with no on street parking. That turned out not to be the case - you can park a couple of minutes away (at least on the weekend). No excuse for the parking charge - it is what we will remember about this hotel and the reason we will not return.
Manager Response: Dear Mike C,   Thank you for choosing our hotel and taking the time to rate your stay. We are sorry we did not live up to your expectations on this visit.  Please accept our apologies for the problems that inconvenienced you and impacted your rating.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: We love this hotel because the rooms are all suites (large) & the facilities are good. Pool, gym, plenty of outdoor seating, fantastic buffet breakfast service. The only thing is the rooms are stuck in the 1980’s ... but for the price it’s ok for this area (& the great gym & breakfast make up for the decor).
Manager Response: Dear Map6,   We appreciate the detailed feedback about your stay with us. We are always looking for ways to improve, and your comments regarding the room decor have been noted for our plans in developing the property. We apologize for not meeting your expectations, and we are grateful for your business. We hope to welcome you again in the future.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: This is an average Marriott.  The location is good.  If you like to run, walk or bike, the Back Bay Loop is right out back of the hotel.  It is a great, scenic path.  The lobby is a basic Marriott lobby.  Front desk staff said hi most times I walked by.  My room was ok.  The interior style seems dated, but the bed was comfortable enough.  There was a good amount of space in the living room.  The bathroom sink was small, but adequate for one person.  The gym was a basic Marriott gym with nothing special in it.  The pool looked nice.  There is no concierge lounge.  Breakfast was fine.  They do made-to-order omelettes for the buffet.
Manager Response: Dear FTLaw,   We appreciate the detailed feedback about your stay with us and we are delighted our location worked well for you.   We are always looking for ways to improve, and your comments regarding our style have been noted for our plans in developing the property. We apologize for not meeting your expectations, and we are grateful for your business.   We hope to welcome you again in the future for a much better impression.   Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: I came here on business and I have to say that the room was great. It was clean interesting (In regards of the bathroom setting) and nice and quiet. The only thing that I don't agree on is being money hungry. I'm sorry but as a tourist or even a business traveler I don't see the sense of paying for parking now that I know you can park down the block which I did see but was quite unsure to do so. The food is pretty expensive but that is normal for hotel cuisine, especially their mini market with outrageous prices. The desk was wonderful but some of them didn't know what was around the surrounding area at least to walk if you didn't have a car. Close restaurants are a 10-15 min walk away right there on Bristol St (I recommend El Pollo Loco) there is a pizza place not that good and
Manager Response: Dear Open-minded_Hotelier,  Thank you for choosing the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview for your business trip. We are glad to know you enjoyed the spaciousness of your room and had a comfortable stay. However, we are sorry for your disappointment with our parking charges. Please be assured that our fees are in line with what comparable hotels in our vicinity are charging. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: We decided to take the kids for a last minute getaway to the beach, and were pleased to stumble upon this hotel.  We didn't have a reservation, and encountered  Stephanie at the front desk.  Stephanie was so accommodating, friendly, and gave the best service. She was absolutely awesome.   Additionally, the room was very spacious, and  clean.   The property was beautiful and i'll be sure to request a room with a view on my next stay.  The breakfast was wonderful complete with an omelette station, and a bay front view.  It was by far one of the best last minute getaways I've experienced.  The staff at checkout (sorry I couldn't remember her name) was great and gave us the directions to the best beach in the area-  I think it will be my new favorite stop.  Overall, I was pleased
Manager Response: Dear krista009,   Thank you for choosing Newport Beach Marriott Bayview for your getaway. We are delighted you loved our delicious breakfast and comfortable accommodations as well as the excellent service. I’ll be sure to share your compliments with our team, especially Stephanie. It was our pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to seeing you on your next visit.   Charles Cho  General Manager

Summary Heading: Great service, clean, and great food
Summary: This hotel is clean and modern, the service is great, and the food is great.  The rooms are spacious with very comfortable beds and awesome TV services with access to log into your own Netflix account.  For breakfast, get the buffet and head to the omlete station and visit Javier cause his omletes are really good.  Kids can enjoy pancakes and french toast all included in the buffet cost.
Manager Response: Dear Miho H,  Thank you for being our guest at the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are pleased to read your excellent feedback regarding how much you enjoyed your comfortable accommodations and our delicious breakfast offerings. We hope we will be the first hotel you think of on future trips to the area!  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: The staff could not have been friendlier or more accommodating. Just down the street there is a walking path around the bay, where you’ll find lots of locals jogging, and even some folks on horses. Breakfast was best when Javier was working - try the “Javier omelet”. Close to lots of activities. Very clean and comfortable. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Helen M,   Thank you for taking the time to post your comments regarding your recent stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. Your compliments were a pleasure to read, and we are delighted you were thoroughly spoiled by our team. We will be sure to share your fantastic compliments with the entire staff, and especially with Javier. Reviews such as yours mean a lot. Thanks again for recommending us, and we look forward to welcoming you back.  Charles Cho General Manager

Summary: Amazing property, located in a perfect spot for travel to so may places the area has to offer.  Everything was perfect - locations, food, restaurant, pool, outside area, internal decoration , one of the nicest Marriott's I have stayed in.
Manager Response: Dear everitt79,  Thanks so much for the terrific review. We are pleased everything went great for you during your visit and that our wonderful location made it even better. Thank you for choosing Newport Beach Marriott Bayview, and we look forward to your next stay!  Josef Eberhardt Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary Heading: Great place with free self parking!
Summary: I parked down the hill and walked up to hotel rather than paying for hotel parking. Had a balcony view overlooking the bay which was beautiful. Checking in was good and I got a early check in. Staff was friendly and bellman was also friendly and chatted with him for a while about sports, lol. Room was huge! Separate bedroom and living area. Huge bathroom had tub and shower separate which I love. The balcony was great also and had amazing view. The decor is a tad outdated but everything was clean. Not much in walking distance but a couple of miles away are all the shops and restaurants you could ask for. Great stay and would definitely stay here again if i'm in the area! The reason for only 4 stars is I reserve 5 stars for incredible luxury hotels with superb service. 4 stars in
Manager Response: Dear Rye P,   Thank you for choosing Newport Beach Marriott Bayview for your accommodation and for sharing your review. It is a pleasure to know you had a wonderful stay with us and loved our friendly staff, along with your all-suite accommodations, all of which feature luxury amenities like marble bathrooms, sumptuous bedding, and beautiful views. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.    Josef Eberhardt Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: Came for a wedding at the Pelican Hill Resort but didn't feel like paying Pelican prices. This one was $253 with tax on a Sunday night. A "suite" is a tiny bedroom separated by French doors leading to a "living room" furnished with a sofa, arm chair, desk, bar (no alcohol in it, per Marriott's Mormon policy), and television. Stayed on the 2nd floor, with some view of the back bay - nothing spectacular, but definitely better than facing a wall.   Vanity area was small but serviceable. Good shower was walk-in (mercifully no tub), bed was actually good quality, just the right amount of firm, with good pillows. Used my own toiletries, as the ones available left a lot to be desired. No shower cap unless you ask. Towels are substandard. Definitely nothing 4-star about it, and
Manager Response: Dear Xtacine,   Thank you for your review of your visit with us. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent service to all our guests and it sounds like your first impression of our hotel was a good one. We were sorry to read that we were not able to meet your every expectation during your stay. We do our best to maintain high standards, and we continually strive to improve upon our service. Candid comments like yours help us in this process, so we appreciate your feedback about our toiletries offered and our towels. We have shared your concerns with our team to evaluate what we can do to better our guest experience. Thank you again, and we hope to have the opportunity to provide you with an even better stay on your next visit.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: John the bellman provided the best customer service I've ever seen. He knew everything to do around the area and was extremely helpful with everything else that we needed. The hotel was also beautiful and all employees were great, except for Pam. Johnny's the man.
Manager Response: Dear TJ S,  Thanks for including Newport Beach Marriott Bayview in your travel plans. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your birthday stay with us. Thanks for recognizing John and for your kind compliments. We will share your feedback with our team as a reminder that their efforts do not go unnoticed. We appreciate your review and look forward to having you as our guest again.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: We highly recommend this hotel.  The room set up was perfect for our families and the hotel staff was extremely helpful.  If you are looking for a nice hotel for a reasonable price and be close to the beach, then this hotel is a good choice.  Our family was very happy with our stay.  Thank you Marriott for making us feel at home.
Manager Response: Dear Shari G,   Thank you for sharing your wonderful review of Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. Service and facilities are our best assets that we can offer to our guests, and we are thrilled to know you enjoyed your time with us. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you again for another memorable trip.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: فندق جيد جدا من حيث الخدمة الممتازة و النظافة وحسن الاستقبال ، حيث الموقع الرائع جدا ______ Very good hotel in terms of excellent service, cleanliness and good reception, so the location is very impressive
Manager Response: Dear Mubarakalmansoori01,   Thank you for the nice rating of Newport Beach Marriott Bayview! Located on the bay, we combine outstanding service and accommodations with convenient access to top California coastal towns like Huntington Beach and Laguna Beach. We are delighted your stay was perfect in every way, and we look forward to seeing you soon.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary Heading: Not bad . . . but . . . there are a number of issues
Summary: It would probably be unfair, overall, to rate this hotel as poor (two stars) but it’s clearly too much of a stretch to rate it as very good (four stars). First, the good: its location is convenient to major highways (without the noise), UC Irvine, and a number of business centers. The staff are very friendly and responsive (one exception noted below), and the restaurant provides good food and service (again, one exception noted below). The room we had was large (a two-room suite) and served our purposes, but it was not particularly comfortable.   Here are our issues. They don’t offer valet parking, which is no big deal, but they charge $29/night for self parking, which is a big deal. They don’t have anyone at the entrance to help with bags, and when we arrived there weren’t even
Manager Response: Dear Jon R,  Thank you for choosing our resort and for sharing your observations about your stay. We appreciate your kind words about our convenient location and friendly service, but we are sorry we were not at our best in all areas.  We are truly sorry for the missteps in servicing your room, as well as for the problems you encountered with your waitress in our restaurant. We will be addressing these concerns with the proper team members to ensure these issues do not arise again. We appreciate you bringing these concerns to our attention, and hope you will give us an opportunity to provide you with a better stay on your next trip.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary Heading: Great Customer Service Makes A Difference
Summary: While searching for a hotel on a recent business trip. I discovered there are a lot of nice hotels in the Newport Beach, Costa Mesa area. I chose the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview based upon a recommendation by a friend and was pleased with my choice.  The hotel is very nice, the rooms are large and comfortable; it also contains a well-equipped workout room and a decent restaurant and bar. However, as I stated, there are lots of nice places in this area. What made this hotel one I shall return to again and again are the people. From my initial experience with Conrad during check in, the waiters at breakfast and the bartender who directed me to a very nice cigar bar.  Each member of the staff was professional, attentive and made my stay enjoyable and seamless. While searching
Manager Response: Dear kevuclaalumni,   Thank you for taking the time to post your wonderful review regarding your stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. Your compliments were a pleasure to read, and we're delighted you were thoroughly spoiled by our team. We will be sure to share your fantastic comments with the entire staff. We appreciate your business and look forward to having you as our guest again.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: This hotel has been recently renovated.  It is very close to John Wayne Airport and overlooks the Back Bay Conservation area that has trails.  It is also not far from Fashion Island.  The rooms are suites and very nice.
Manager Response: Dear karen6886,  Thank you for choosing the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview and for sharing your review. We are glad to know you had a pleasant stay with us and liked our clean & comfortable accommodations and convenient location. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we hope to see you again on your next visit to our area.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: We stayed at the hotel three nights, the place is really nice with a beautiful view of the back bay. The hotel’s staff is definitely nice and joyful. My family, the Alemani’s, would like to express our gratitude to the Chef Renzo Sassarino for the kindness and the courtesy showed with us. A big thanks. Your Italian family, the Alemani’s.
Manager Response: Dear Francesco A,   Thank you for being our guest at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview and for sharing your review. It is a pleasure to know you & your family had a wonderful stay with us and loved our outstanding service and comfortable accommodations. We will be sure to share your fantastic compliments with Chef Renzo, for providing amazing hospitality. Thanks again, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you again soon.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary Heading: Great landing pad and easy access to Newport Beach attractions
Summary: Stayed here for a weekend. We had a bayview king suite - very pleasant room, roomy bathroom, just a little small on the bathroom countertop (not an issue for two people, but might have been if we'd brought our daughters). The staff at the desk is SUPER pleasant and helpful, and best of all, interested. Really made us feel like guests rather than mere customers. They helpfully supplied us with an area map, and a list of restaurants, designating which had water views.  The restaurant onsite also has excellent staff, good food, and has both indoor and outdoor seating, with views of the Back Bay. In the evening there are fire pits so you can linger outside. The front desk can rent you cruiser bicycles or electric bicycles, which you can take a block away to the Back Bay paved trail
Manager Response: Dear Mona A,  Thank you for being our guest at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are glad you liked our convenient location and the great service provided by our associates made it a great experience. We will definitely share your compliments with our entire team. Thanks again for your wonderful review, and we look forward to welcoming you both back soon.  Josef Eberhardt Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: Just got back from a girls weekend at this hotel. I loved having the extra space! We were on the third floor and while I did not book a bay view when you stepped out into the balcony you actually got a pretty nice view of it so that was a fun surprise. The counter space in the bathroom is a bit lacking, which only became a problem when two girls were trying to get ready to go out plus with the doors being mostly sliders there wasn’t always a lot of privacy. In general we had a great time, the staff was attentive, the room was spacious and I would definitely consider staying again.
Manager Response: Dear Brittany A,  Thank you for the fantastic rating of Newport Beach Marriott Bayview and for sharing your review. We are glad to know you & your friends had a wonderful stay with us and liked our friendly staff and comfortable accommodations. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest, and we hope to see you again soon.   Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: We prefer to stay at Marriott properties because of the reputation and consistency of Marriott.  Simple stated- we know what to expect.  Newport Beach Marriott Bayview is in a great location- central to the PCH, Fashion Island, Balboa Isla, and Peninsula, and close enough to freeways to quickly (well, for So. Cal) get to other destinations in the area.  The staff is beyond friendly and helpful and we have zero complaints about the property and amenities.  We love that Marriott Bayview is situated in a somewhat quiet area but not so secluded that we don’t have quick and easy access to Jamboree Road.  While definitively not a resort type hotel, the Marriott Bayview more than met our needs for our quick getaway to Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Dear CaptainNalga,  Thank you for the fantastic rating of Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. Located on the bay, we combine outstanding service and accommodations with convenient access to top California coastal towns like Huntington Beach and Laguna Beach. We are delighted your stay was perfect in every way, and we look forward to seeing you soon.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary Heading: Great property, not so great service
Summary: Room 709 needs the upholstered furniture cleaned.  The HVAC unit is too noisy to use - sounds like loose change in a clothes dryer. The bed is lumpy and too soft.  All these items were reported to the front desk and the clerk (turquoise colored eyeglass frames) who nodded politely and ignored us.  That same clerk refused to honor the room rate that we were they intervened and got the manager involved.  Josef resolved the billing issue for us.  Special thanks to Javier, the breakfast chef for his always positive demeanor and superb omelettes.  And an extra loud shout out to Nathan in the dining room for his professionalism and attentiveness.
Manager Response: Dear SantaFeRetiree,  Thank you for your review. I am pleased to read that your issue was resolved to your satisfaction while you were still here. I will surely share your compliments with Javier and Nathan for an amazing service they provided. We hope you and your family will choose us again whenever you are in the area.   Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: Amazing staff, amazing stay! Frederica, Stephanie and Nicole at the front desk were very friendly and professional. They took good care of us with daily smiles and were ready to address any questions we had about the area.Our room was beautiful with a great view and our bed was super comfortable. Nice, beautiful, hiking trails to walk/exercise super close to hotel and shops are walking distance. Our housekeeper, Eva, took perfect care of our room and was so accommodating; we left late every day. Our coffee ladies Paula and Silver were so sweet, professional and super charming. Wait staff, Nathan and Santos, were so attentive and professional Bar tender Laura was so delightful and professional, we enjoyed chatting with her. Manager Jason was superb, very friendly and
Manager Response: Dear Ginita59,  Thank you for your glowing review regarding your stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We're delighted to know you were thoroughly spoiled by our team and enjoyed the amazing view from your room. We will be sure to share your fantastic compliments with the entire staff. We look forward to having you both as our guest again soon.  Josef Eberhardt Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary Heading: The infused flavored water was welcoming
Summary: After a warm day of visiting all the beaches it was so refreshing to walk in this hotel to see fresh infused flavored water around the corner. Different flavors daily. The dining area is very appealing and outside courtyard was romantic and comfortable overlooking the nature preserve area. The evening out there has gas fireplaces by each table to add a special touch. Rooms were clean and modern  They could have had a bigger bathroom vanity area but other than that well laid out. Maid service was excellent and front desk staff very helpful.  We had an issue with our WIFI connection everyday we were there and they were helpful on fixing it.  Very quiet too and walk across the street to go for a run or walk along the path around the nature preserve. Great unwinding time along the
Manager Response: Dear Becky W,   Thank you for your fantastic review of the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are delighted to know you liked our wonderful location and were impressed with the outstanding service provided by our staff. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future.  Josef Eberhardt Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: Nice view hotel with over priced parking fees. Lots of road noise at pool area. Rooms and beds are good. This is a pet hotel. Our room had pet urine on the carpet. The hotel offered to move us and gave us free internet and parking as well. But both parking and inernet should be free anyway. Nice Asian resturaunt walking distance. Bay hikes across the street
Manager Response: Dear Steve Z,  Thank you for sharing the highlights of your stay at the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview and letting us know you had a pleasant time being here. Thanks again for being our guest, and we hope you will allow us to be of your service again in the future.   Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: We stayed several nights and had no issues. The staff was friendly. Bed was super comfy. The room was clean. They were very helpful when we had questions and we liked the location. It wasn’t too busy of an area. Great safe area. If you have kids you will feel at ease.

I stayed at this hotel for two nights when I was in Newport Beach for a work trip. The rooms are spacious and are suite style. There is a fridge in the room and a nice bathtub for relaxing and a separate shower.  I'm a fairly light sleeper and this hotel was very quiet in general. There was a bit of noise from the airport nearby but thankfully the flights stop at about 10pm so it didn't disturb my sleep.  The pool was under constructions so I didn't get to check it out this trip. There is a nice view of the bay and some walking/biking trails nearby.  I would recommend staying here!

Smartphone wireless key did not work on parking gate.  On second day the key card stopped working on parking gate.  Interior doors catch on floor; need to be cut or planed.  Bed frame edges creak/groan, when exiting bed.  Install soft-close toilet seats and lids.  Incorrectly assigned to a handicapped-accessible room without notice.  View of bay is not worth the extra cost.  Valet apologized for problems with parking gate problems. It's NOT his fault. Train your employees to stop apologizing for problems that are not their fault! It's disingenuous. Simply say, "I'll make sure that your problem is reported to management."
Manager Response: Hello RationalGuy,  Thank you for choosing our hotel and taking the time to rate your stay. We are sorry we did not live up to your expectations, or ours, and we hope you will give us another chance to provide you with the excellent service you should always expect from us. Please accept our apologies for the maintenance problems that inconvenienced you and impacted your rating.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: The first factors I look for in a hotel are: the location, room size and price. This hotel may not have ocean front location but this hotel has a beautiful bay view, comfortably sized suites and a fair price. These factors make this hotel a winning combination for my needs.   The view is lovely. This hotel sits in a very peaceful upper Newport Bay location. The view helps relax the nerves. The room has a balcony so you can open your sliding glass door and allow the ocean breeze to fill the suite.   The room itself has a separate living room with contemporary, clean and well kept furniture! The bed was sufficiently firm to accommodate aching backs. The sink was in a separate area from the shower and toilet to allow couples to get ready at the same time. The suite is laid out to
Manager Response: Dear brenagain,    Thank you for being our guest and for sharing your views with fellow travelers. It is a pleasure to know you had a delightful stay with us and liked your clean & well-kept room along with the prompt service provided by our friendly staff. Reviews such as yours mean a lot. Thanks again, we look forward to welcoming you back to Newport Beach Marriott Bayview.   Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary Heading: GOOD LOCATION, LARGE ROOMS, NICE FAMILY HOTEL
Summary: This is an older property but it is well maintained and  clean and they are attempting to update it. Our suite was roomy and we got an adjoining suite for our adult granddaughter which was very convenient. The staff was very friendly and accommodating.   The beds were comfortable, bathrooms a little dated but they are trying to update by adding a walk in shower. Note that there is a $29 charge daily for self parking (that is very standard, though on all Orange County hotels).  The location is very good and there is a very nice walking and jogging trail across the street along the bay..

I make reservations for future guest speakers at our university. They over charged  for one of my guest. They simply said: "the corporate rate was not available" . I am cancelling my next 11 visits and they did not care.  extremely disappointed that they rather loose my business that to reduce one charge by $100 bucks.
Manager Response: Dear Salase2018,  It was disappointing to read about the incident with booking your reservation, as this is not the impression that we like our guests to leave with. We thank you for pointing it out to us, and we cannot apologize enough. We hope you will consider this an isolated incident and give us another chance. We would love the opportunity to provide you with the hospitality that you should have experienced.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: this is a decent property.  good dining area, with outdoor fireplaces.  rooms were new, good hotel pool and fitness room.  also two blocks from an amazing running/riding trail (upper Newport).  only complaint is that movies weren't available in the rooms as their system is transitioning.

This hotel is beautiful inside & out! It is close to everything you will want to do while you are in Newport Beach! Nice bare inside if you are into that! I went whale watching in the area with my grandma and this hotel was very convenient. All of the staff were wonderful to my grandmother, they were so sweet and nice to her from the bellmen to the front desk team to the housekeeping! That is really important to me during hotel stays that everyone is treated kindly and sometimes people become impatient with a wild grandma, she can be a riot! But thank you Newport Beach Marriott Bayview for making our stay amazing, we appreciate the hard work of every staff member there!

Summary Heading: Great location near SNA with a good view
Summary: The Newport Beach Marriott Bayview is on the upper Newport Bay.  It's very convenient to John Wayne Airport.  Many of the rooms offer a good view of the upper-Newport Bay.  The hotel is on the smaller side, so more intimate for a chain hotel.  It is about a 10 minute ride from the ocean.

Rooms are well worn in this hotel.  We had a suite with a bay view and although well layed out, the finishes are tired and the bathroom needed refurbishment.  The mini bar area and coffee pot were not well cleaned and the finish on the cabinets was worn through.  The gates at the parking area are an issue.  They don’t always work to enter and exit and unless you’ve booked a package that includes the daily parking, you are going to see this added to your bill.  The staff is accommodating and friendly.   Very busy hotel.
Manager Response: Dear travelwriterwannab,   Thank you for staying with us and for your review. It’s great to hear our staff was friendly and accommodating. However, we apologize for the problems you experienced with our gates and your room.  Your total satisfaction is our top priority and we regret the inconvenience this caused. We appreciate your patience and hope you will stay with us again for a more gratifying experience.    Josef Eberhardt   Director of Hotel Operations  Marriott Hotels  Travel Brilliantly

Summary: The staff here at the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview are fantastic. They went above and beyond for me while I was here for two nights. Specifically, Mallory who was the evening manager on-duty while I was checking in. She handled a guest who was WAY out of line with style and class.   Also, tryout the motor assisted bikes you can rent to tour the back bay. It was worth it and a great way to see the bay!
Manager Response: Dear JaxVegas2011,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful comments about your stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are thrilled to read you were thoroughly spoiled by our courteous associates. We appreciate you recognizing our efforts. Our entire team is looking forward to welcoming you on your next visit to our beautiful city.  Josef Eberhardt Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: Stephanie at check in was great. John was very welcoming and always had a great attitude and great local advice. Danny and the breakfast team that was working during my stay were amazing!!! I can't wait to return to this property. I had the most relaxing birthday weekend ever!

Summary Heading: Another great stay at the Marriott Bayview overlooking the Back Bay
Summary: This was our 4th stay at the Marriott Bayview and our favorite hotel choice when visiting Newport Beach. Overlooking the Back Bay, it is in a quiet location not far from Fashion Island with a blend of business and vacationing guests. Thanks Raymundo for the courteous and profession room registration. We always enjoy hanging out by the fire pits in the early evening and thank you Xavier and Danny for  the time you both spent serving us and sharing conversation in the evenings at the fire pits. You made us feel at home. We'll be heading back soon!

My wife and I stay here every couple of months during frequent Newport Beach visits - nine nights this month. Dynamic pricing ranges from Newport Beach reasonable through unreasonably high (midweek) for these mini suites. The kitchen is good; location and bay views are nice features. Outdoor parking at $29/night is high. Housekeeping is poorly managed and often not done in a timely manner. Bath vanity area is dated and cramped. The staff is over the top friendly. All in all a pleasant 2.5 star hotel that Marriott promotes as a bit more than it really is.
Manager Response: Dear DMWest, Welcome back!  We are happy to know that your stay is a positive experience which brings you back again and again.  We appreciate your feedback, specifically your comments regarding the housekeeping services.  We will work to improve in that areas so all aspects of your stay will be to your liking.  It will be a pleasure to welcome you and your wife back again soon for another quality visit.   Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary Heading: Affordable, Centrally Located Newport Beach Getaway!
Summary: My husband and I were looking for a reasonably priced Newport Beach hotel for an overnight getaway prior to Christmas. We wanted to be within striking distance of Disneyland, Costa Mesa's South Coast Plaza, Fashion Island and the Newport Beach Harbor. We did not want to pay the prices for hotels right on the harbor or ocean as that was not a priority for this trip. Relying on other TripAdvisor reviews, we came upon the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview which suited and exceeded all of our needs! Our room was a corner suite overlooking the 'bay:' roomy, modern, clean, quiet and very pretty! The bed was extremely comfortable with excellent linens. Breakfast was delicious and the service throughout our stay was superb. This is a real find for those who do not need to be 'on the water'

Enjoyed my time here. Staff is friendly and accommodating. Nice trail really close to hotel. Took a few evening strolls. Beautiful scenery. Make sure you choose a room facing the reservoir and not the parking garage. Rooms and nice and clean.

The hotel itself was beautiful- room was spacious and clean. We appreciated being able to overlook some of the bay from our balcony. Front desk staff was exceptionally helpful and friendly- they are awesome!
Manager Response: Dear 176kaylam,  Thank you for sharing your amazing feedback about your stay at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are delighted to read you loved the comfort of your roomy room and the service provided by our front desk associates made you visit a memorable one. We appreciate you sharing your nice comments and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Josef Eberhardt Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: Just minutes from John Wayne Airport made it very convenient. The staff was exceptionally nice and provided great service. The restaurant was good if you didn't want to go out. The location is also good to a lot of shopping. I chose to drive about 10 miles to the Market Place and found a lot of great shopping. The only reason I didn't rate it a 5 was the fitness center was not convenient. You had to go outdoors to get to the fitness center; not connected to hotel.
Manager Response: Dear KandKFairhope,  It was a pleasure to host you at the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are thrilled to read you loved our close proximity to the airport and were impressed with the all that we have to offer. Thanks once more for allowing us to be of service, and we hope to have the pleasure of doing so again on your next trip.  Josef Eberhardt Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary Heading: Very pleased - convenient location; great room
Summary: I booked this room as part of an airfare/hotel combo on Travelocity - I didn't know what to expect, I simply was shopping for value.  The hotel was far beyond what I expected.  Very clean; very up-to-date.  My room was a true suite (and not like Embassy Suites).  A bedroom with French doors into the living room and another set of doors into the bathroom.  When family visited, I appreciated the ability to close off the bedroom.  The bathroom had a full size tub and a separate walk-in shower.  One thing I didn't like was the very expensive parking charge - $30/day.  As a nice surprise, the hotel comp'ed my parking.  The Travelocity booking made no mention of this parking charge - that was an unpleasant surprise.

This hotel overlooks marshlands, but I found that okay for the price.  We got an "upgrade" to a one bedroom, but on the second floor balcony overlooking a graveled roof.  I would recommend the hotel upgrading platinums to higher floors only, would've been a nice consideration.  The bar, pool, hot tub, and the limited outside seating is nice; however, the breakfast system should be smoothed out.  Platinum will not get you free breakfast here.  For the price on a weekend, it did it's job.  We ultimately just took a Lyft to have dinner at the Ritz Carlton in Laguna.  The service here felt particularly younger and just didn't have the level of relating to customers I would have preferred.  Sort of "young and dumb".
Manager Response: Dear Chuck G,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your concerns. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the majority of your stay but see that there is room for improvement. Our goal is to provide friendly, responsive service and we apologize that we fell short during your visit. We will definitely step up our game so we don't disappoint you again.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: We were visiting LA for a weekend a needed a place to stay – Somewhere close enough to downtown LA and Irvine University. The hotel is perfect for that. About 40-50 min to LA (depends on the traffic, of course) and 10 min from the Uni.  The bedroom suite is really good – You don’t feel “confined” into a tiny box of a room, great view and served its purpose. It's not a luxury hotel, I really don't feel like it's a family location - It's a good place to lay your head while enjoying the city, nothing more, nothing less.  We liked it and will definitely come back
Manager Response: Dear  IlanB, Thank you for this generous review of your stay at the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview and for your kind recommendation to other travellers. We are delighted that our location convenient to downtown LA and Irvine University suited your needs perfectly and that you enjoyed your comfortable accommodations. It was our pleasure to serve you and we look forward to welcoming you again soon.   Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary Heading: Nice staff and location just dated
Summary: The staff at this hotel were great, we were greeted by friendly desk people and because of my gold status, they upgraded all of our rooms to Bay view rooms which was a nice touch. We also all got free breakfast at the hotel restaurant.   Downside - no club lounge.  Nice printer in the lobby though  There is only one restaurant at this hotel, the bar area is small but they do have nice indoor and outdoor seating.   For just an overnight being in town for business, this was a nice place to crash. The lobby has been well maintained and updated. However, the rooms need a refresh, you can tell the hotel hasn't been remodeled recently. All the rooms here are suites though, so it's nice to have the big space and balcony.
Manager Response: Dear Kristin S, Thank you for your review.  We are pleased to know you were impressed by many aspects of your stay, specifically our service.  We understand, and agree there are some areas of our hotel which are starting to show some wear and are in need of a refresh.  We are pleased to share that we are working on a refresh program which will bring you to a level of complete satisfaction on your next visit.  Thank you for letting us know how we can improve, your feedback is appreciated.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: Nicole at the front desk was super helpful, friendly, and personable. It was a nice welcome to our staycation. She was even able to upgrade us to a bay view room which was a very pleasant surprise! We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear mblume09,  Thank you for choosing Newport Beach Marriott Bayview! We are thrilled to know Nicole took excellent care of you and made you feel welcome. I will surely share your compliments. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Josef Eberhardt Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary Heading: Quiet location on the back bay.
Summary: Wonderful hotel in the Marriott tradition.  The room was comfortable and well decorated.  Nice view of the back bay from the lobby and restaurant areas.  Very friendly staff.  Moderately priced for the area.  Would highly recommend for a quiet weekend getaway.
Manager Response: Dear Flycast47,  It was a pleasure having you as our guest at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are glad to know you found us to be a good value and that your well-appointed room, as well as the service provided by our courteous associates, added to your exceptional visit. We thoroughly appreciate your recommendation and look forward to seeing you again on your future trip.  Josef Eberhardt Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: Great boutique style hotel with really good food & service! Perfect for a quick getaway from the rat race for some good R&R. The rooms are all suites perfect for the family which makes it reasonable as well. Beach, Disneyland & plenty of other stuff to do are close by.
Manager Response: Dear Macsix,  Thank you for being our guest at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We are pleased to read our location was ideal for your needs and that you enjoyed your comfortable room and our courteous service. We appreciate you sharing your nice comments and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Josef Eberhardt Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: Newport Beach is an annual business trip for me. I have always stayed at the Mart Newport Beach Spa resort. Thought I would change it up this year and give the. Bayview a shot. VERY happy that I did. The staff is exceptionally friendly, great service, fantastic location view and rooms. Much quieter than the Fashion island area,.but still a quick trip to get there..and to Balboa. I am a Marriott Platinum member and this is one of my fave hotels ....
Manager Response: Dear Patricia M,  Thank you so much for confirming to others that what a great choice Newport Beach Marriott Bayview is! We strive to provide an outstanding experience to all of our guests, and we are delighted to know we accomplished this while you were here. We appreciate your loyalty towards our brand and look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay.  Josef Eberhardt Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: Stayed here for a week for training for work. The parking was easy and ample. Our room was a king suite with a sofa and desk and wet bar in the living room. There were french doors that separated the king bed from the living room. Small balcony too!. Large zero entry shower and separate tub. The maid service is was great. We went down for buffet breakfast a few mornings and they had a made to order station where you could get eggs, omelets, pancakes and waffles. Couldn't think of anything else that I would want to eat that they didn't have. The servers were fast to bring coffee and juice. Was super happy they had plates and silverware and it wasn't paper or Styrofoam. The bar was happy to give us a "church key" to open our beer bottles and even had limes for us! The pool was
Manager Response: Dear effintravelers, thanks so much for recommending us to future travelers. We are delighted you were so pleased with the quality of our service and enjoyed your spacious suite. Even though we are in the hospitality business, it's always nice to be recognized by our guests. Thanks again, and we look forward to welcoming you back to Newport Beach Marriott Bayview.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable, & friendly, but disappointing for a Marriott
Summary: When I book a Marriott, I usually do so feeling assured it will be a quality place and a good stay, without having to read the reviews. This time we were disappointed.   The positives: impeccably clean, friendly and helpful staff, comfortable bed, nice sized room in the Bayview Suite, great hair dryer, decent (though expensive) breakfast.  These were great and in line with Marriott quality.   Areas they need to work on:   The bathroom design is terrible. In looking at pictures after the fact, they do accurately reflect how tiny the sink area is, and I made the mistake of assuming there were two sinks, which made 2 people getting ready impossible.   There was zero water pressure in the shower. The only way to get enough water was to have it all the way to hot water, which was
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent stay. We apologize for the difficulty you experienced while trying to reach our front desk as well as not meeting your expectations in regard to your room. Your feedback, including comments about what we did right as well as areas where we can improve, helps us to better our customer service. We hope you will give us another chance to welcome you back.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: When I checked into the room the bed was made up and looked clean however when I got into bed I was disgusted to find the sheets were soiled by the previous occupants and were not changed.  I was so nauseated that I could not leave the hotel fast enough.
Manager Response: Dear GeekStick, thank you for sharing your review. Please accept our sincerest apologies for our hotel not living up to your expectations during your stay. Providing a clean, comfortable room is our top priority, so we have addressed this matter with our Executive Housekeeper and associates. We hope you will consider giving us another opportunity to serve you in the future.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: The room was very nice and was an upgrade to help accommodate my son and me. Was a nice view although if not on top floor no double bed rooms have a view. Room was very clean. Room service menu as well as restaurant menu is quite limited.  The charge for parking is $29.00 per night for outside vs garage space. Welcome to CA I guess. The outstanding feature for this hotel however is the staff. Anyone you encounter from time of check in to any service request is met with enthusiasm and warmth. I'd come back to this hotel simply to be treated so kindly.
Manager Response: Dear bdw8285, thank you for posting such kind comments about our hotel, especially about our staff. We make every effort to provide service that is above and beyond your expectations, so we are pleased to see that you loved your stay. Thanks for choosing the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We hope to welcome you again soon!  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: My husband & I stayed here on a date night after watching a local musical & for the price, we were really pleased. Our room was a 1 bedroom suite with a stunning view of the bay & the Newport Bay Trail is right across the beach, perfect for running/walking. The gym, pool & jacuzzi were well appointed & there are plenty of places to sit outdoors with little fire/ice tables. It's a Marriott...not The Four Seasons, but I thought it was great for the price we paid. The customer service given by every staff member at the front desk was superior. The only thing I didn't like is that you have to pay for wifi, oh well. I stayed off of the internet. I would return again, even with my kids, when staying in the area.
Manager Response: Dear travelingtiff, thank you for choosing to stay at the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We love to make our guests feel comfortable and at home, so we appreciate knowing that you enjoyed your special date night away. Thanks for mentioning our fantastic location near the bay too. We're so glad that it worked well for you. We hope that you will plan to stay with us again the next time you visit the area!  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary Heading: Convenient to the airport but not the beach
Summary: This was a fine place to stay. Courteous staff, clean room etc.   I would not pay again to have the ‘bayview’ room. It’s not really a bay In my opinion. More of a backwater. The balcony is too small for a chair really, so unless you are going to stay in your room and gaze out the window, save your money to pay for the $28 a night parking fee.   When I did open the slider to the ‘balcony’ the pool and event area was right below us and noisy. There must have been a wedding, so party on, but still not restful. Just FYI the other view is of a parking garage, soooo.  Convenient to major freeways and there is a great little restaurant in a strip mall across the freeway called Juliette kitchen and bar
Manager Response: Dear Csharp12, thank you for being our guest and for sharing your experience with fellow travelers. We apologize for your disappointment with some aspects of your stay and the noise issues you experienced. Thank you for pointing out our convenient location to the airport and our friendly team. Your feedback is appreciated, and we hope you will visit us again.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: This hotel has a view of the bay but it's not what you think. It's not like SF bay. It looks more like a lagoon.  The location is good - near Orange County Airport, Irvine, Newport Beach Fashion Mall, etc.  The rooms are outdated. It really needs a makeover. The price for what you get doesn't justify. But I would stay for the location.  The staff were mediocre. Like a lot of people in Southern Cal, they don't seem to like their job in the hotel service industry. It's just a job.  I didn't have time to check out the rest of the hotel. I can't comment about the gym or the grounds.
Manager Response: Dear Anthony, thank you for sharing your experience. Our goal is for you to have a flawless experience, and it appears we mostly succeeded. While we appreciate you pointing out our excellent location, we apologize for falling short of making your stay 100% perfect. Thanks again for your feedback and we do hope you will come back again soon.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: I stayed at this Marriott location on previous visits and was satisfied enough to return, but this time they added parking fees and left a gratuity envelope for the housekeeping.  I pay a premium price for a decent place and don't like to be nickeled and dimed to death.  Terah at the front desk was not helpful.  I was not pleased and don't recommend this particular Marriott.  I think there are better options available.
Manager Response: Dear FritzBikely, thank you for returning to our hotel and for taking the time to provide feedback. We were disappointed to read that your stay was anything less than exceptional, and hope you will accept our apologies for not meeting your expectations. We hope you will consider giving us another chance to prove we are up to the task of delivering excellent service and accommodations.   Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: Beautiful, great staff, good value!!  Breakfast brunch offered variety with an omelet station.  Fire pits glowing at night created a beautiful ambiance.  All staff very friendly and accommodating.  Location convenient.
Manager Response: Dear ILS-Wiggy, thank you for the 5-star review! We are glad that your stay was enjoyable and that we were able to meet your expectations at a great price. We couldn't be more pleased that you enjoyed your stay at the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview and we appreciate you taking the time to let us know. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a future stay.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary Heading: Great guest service makes for a memorable family weekend!
Summary: My family thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Bayview Marriott. Upon arrival, Art at the front desk was incredibly accommodating with our room request & saw to it that we had our ideal room which was beautiful & spacious--perfect for traveling with two little ones. Nora did a great job each day to ensure our room was clean & tidy--no small task when kids are occupying the space. While the service was exceptional throughout, the team at the breakfast buffet provided some of the best service I've experienced in a long time. Each morning of our stay Daniela took great care of us by being attentive, personable and friendly, while Santos also catered to our every need. And then there was Javier on the grill--I can't even express the level of service he delivered. Each day, no matter
Manager Response: Dear huskergirl11, thank you for the fantastic review and for taking time to recognize our hotel. We are delighted to know how much you enjoyed the attentive, caring service provided by our staff. We'll be sure to share your gracious comments with everyone! Thanks for being our guest, and we can't wait to welcome you and your family back to the Newport Beach Marriott Bayview.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: What a nice place!  The room was very spacious. Beautiful property.  Only one disappointment.  The bartender on duty that evening didn't really seem to care.  She made me 2 lemon drop martinis.  Both had old brown lemons and one didn't have a sugar rim.   Breakfast was great!!  Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Pam0111, thank you for your review regarding your recent stay with us. Although we were pleased you thoroughly enjoyed your overall stay, we were sorry we did not meet your expectations at our restaurant bar. We will share your feedback with our Food & Beverage team to make improvements. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary Heading: A good place for a couple of days
Summary: Tipical luxury hotel. The suite is very bright. The bed extremely comfortable. The staff professional, polite and kind.
