They give me all the information about Newport Beach (was my first visit). It's in a strategical position. Very near to the centre but in a quiet location. You can reach the beach in ten minutes by car. Also very near to the main access roads. Only two things I didn't like very much : - the car parking is 28$ a day and in the suite I found two 16 oz Fiji water bottles for the price of 5$ each (when usually as welcome water is free).  But overall price-quality is good. I reccomend it.
Manager Response: Dear emanuelebelgeri, thank you for staying with us and for your wonderful feedback. We are thrilled that you loved our great hospitality as well as our central location. It's encouraging to receive comments like yours that let us know we are meeting our goal of service excellence. Thank you again for choosing Newport Beach Marriott Bayview. We hope you will stay with us again!   Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: Great front office team! Thank you all for being so kind and accommodating. Rooms were also much bigger than I anticipated. Great location and an awesome running trail right by the hotel. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear fur_saleh, thanks for the outstanding review! We were delighted to read how much you enjoyed your stay and that our staff provided you with excellent service. Thank you for acknowledging our Front Desk team for a job well done. It was our pleasure hosting you at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: Smooth check in.  Very cheerful & helpful staff at check in /checkout. Very large comfortable room overlooking pool & Bay. We chose the continental breakfast offered (instead of points). The breakfast offerings were many. Nicely set out & a quick option. Self parking steps away (no valet service).  Only Con was the annoying parking gate that is quirky & room key wouldn't work to open it, but the easy button is there for assistance.
Manager Response: Dear SeattleBoraBora, thank you for staying with us and for your wonderful feedback! Every team member works hard to deliver a great guest experience, so we really appreciate your complimentary review. We look forward welcoming you back to Newport Beach Marriott Bayview soon!  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: Beautiful place to have a wedding.  Nice things for the kids to do at the pool. The room was hard to get too. Had to up and down the stairs.was like a maze. Bikes available but in need of repair. They charge money after 2hrs. Pretty steep. 20$/hr. The mall was conveniently across the street. Food is pricey there.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your recent visit to our hotel. We appreciate your comments in regard to holding special events here, and we're glad you enjoyed your time with us. We are committed to offering our guests exceptional service and accommodations. Thanks for letting us know we were successful in meeting your expectations. We hope you choose to stay with us again when your travels bring you back this way.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: It's a very typical Marriott of its class. Rooms are fine. Restaurant will fill you up, though nothing to write home about. The location is convenient to John Wayne, and the surrounding Newport Bay is gorgeous.    Parking is far too expensive though. In this area and at this price, it really should be included in the room rate. WIFI is also an extra charge. Seriously, take whatever rate you're quoted and add $40 a night for all the extras. Queue Master of the House.
Manager Response: Dear Charm H, thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of our hotel. We're so happy you enjoyed your stay with us, but we are sorry that you felt that our parking and WiFi was too expensive. As in every city, certain times of the year are busier and command higher rates, however, we definitely make every effort to be priced competitively. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest, and hope to have the pleasure of doing so again!  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: We stayed at this for 12 hours. In those 12hours, the following occurred:  1. We were issued 4 sets of room key cards as ours constantly stopped working.   2. The parking area gate stopped working so staff had to let us in and out. 3.  Most serious issue:  we were assigned a specific room.  Given keycards for this room. Sat down, settled in,and left.  Upon our return,it just so happened that a party of four was going down the hall at the same time we were.  We actually stopped at the exact same room.  We get there and of course our key did not work.  Turns out they gave our room with all of our stuff inside to another set of guests.  This was very concerning as they could have possibly had access to all of our stuff.    We all walk down to the front desk and the same clerk who
Manager Response: Dear Joseph S, we appreciate you choosing our hotel for your trip to our city, and we are sorry you were so disappointed. Our focus is on the comfort and satisfaction of our guests, and we apologize for the multiple problems you had with the key cards. Please know your comments will be shared with our team in order to prevent this issue from happening again. We hope you will give us another chance to provide you with a much-improved stay.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: We had a warm and helpful early check-in.  In fact, we found the customer service to be exceptionally friendly.  The lobby and outside pool area were quite nice.  Our room had comfortable furniture, but the seating area was dimly lit.  The mini-fridge (no freezer) was noisy.  The bedroom felt a bit cramped for space, while the bathroom had wasted space.  The closet was too small and inconveniently placed.  The bed was comfy, but all of the pillows were mushy.  We heard some traffic noise, but it didn't keep us awake.  The traffic noise was louder in the morning.  The bathroom counter had very little space, but the sink area was well lit.  The bathtub was separate from the shower.  The shower head was good, but the low flow made it take longer to rinse the shampoo out of my hair.
Manager Response: Dear 4 Joyful Travel, Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to leave such great feedback. We are so glad to hear that you were met with friendly service. Our staff truly cares about making sure all of our guests have an excellent experience, so it's nice to see that our efforts are being noticed. However, we are sorry that you experienced a few inconveniences during your trip. We apologize for the mini-fridge being too noisy, and we would have been happy to resolve this issue while you were still here. Also, we would have been happy to provide you with new pillows as well. Our front desk is always available to resolve any issues that may arise. Thank you again for being our guest, and we hope you will choose us again the next time you are in our area!  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: Beautiful hotel with beautiful views! Great service with the attention you'd expect from Marriott. Very clean, spacious rooms with comfortable setting.  The young man at check in was great. I forget his name; he is a student at North Carolina studying hospitality and obviously is going to be good at it! He was attentive, friendly and competent.  The grounds are well attended. Beautiful area.
Manager Response: Dear Kathyklop, thank you for the wonderful review and for choosing to stay with us. We are so happy you had such a great experience and its great to know how well our staff took care of you. We have shared your compliments with the entire front desk team. They all look forward to your next visit. Thanks again for being our guest.  Best, Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels

Summary: This is the second time in 3 months we stayed here. First time was fine, this time was terrible. Customer service is seriously lacking. No bedding for the fold-out couch, when we asked for it was told "there's a blanket somewhere in the room". There was - one thin thing, no comforter or pillows. When we asked for them we got attitude. Had to ask 3 times for clean towels. Called for breakfast room service, they said they'd rush it because otherwise it would take 45 mins and we had to leave, but it still took 45 mins and I couldn't eat it. Who charges for WiFI these days? $12.95/day - ridiculous. For what they charge they should be a 5 star hotel. They are not. Someone needs to explain real customer service to them. Will not go back.
Manager Response: Dear goldwork, Thank you for your review of our hotel. We are sorry you experienced difficulties during your stay with us, and more importantly, that you felt we were not responsive to your needs. We take great pride in delivering an outstanding experience to all who visit, and we apologize this was not the case for you. We appreciate your valuable feedback and hope you will give us a second chance to make a better impression. Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: Stayed at the Bayview Marriott for 3 days.  Room was spacious, clean and comfortable.  The location of the hotel is excellent.  10 minute drive to multiple beaches, restaurants and shopping.  Unfortunately, details missed at the hotel take some luster off of our visit.  Checkin time is 4 pm.  One of our 2 rooms wasn't ready until 6.  Over flowing trash can in lobby.  Lack of pool towels.  Pretzels under lobby coffee table for over 24 hours.  Requested that my room be charged to a different one than given at checkin.  It wasn't.  This property could be exceptional but falls short due to an apparent lack of attention to details.  Feels like a lack of managerial discipline.
Manager Response: Dear denblevins,  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your lodging needs and for sharing your experience with fellow travelers. Although we are glad you found your accommodations to be comfortable and loved our hotel’s location, we apologize we fell short of expectations as we truly take pride in our service to our guests. Your remarks will be shared with our team in an effort to ensure we are more consistent with our service delivery. Rest assured that we will be more diligent going forward, and we appreciate you letting us know areas where improvements can be made. Thank you again for your feedback, and we hope you will give us another chance to welcome you back in the near future.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: We recently stayed at the Marriott Bayview Newport Beach.  Nice Marriott property, sleeping rooms are large but could be updated a bit as well as the hallways. Overall very nice though and the staff makes it even better. Everyone from check-in, wait staff and housekeeping were just so friendly and accommodating.  We had a partial bay view, which really overlooked the courtyard and pool. I was a bit disappointed that this was really the "back bay". My view was from the 5th floor and kind of a marshy looking view. The pool area is pretty small but was nice.  The location is close to a great mall, Fashion Island. We used Uber for dinners out and got around very well in our rental car.  It is close to a highway so you do hear a bit of street noise on the property and in the sleeping
Manager Response: Dear mdluvs2shop,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on your recent visit. We take great pride in delivering excellent service so feedback like yours assure us that we are meeting that goal. Our staff is committed to making sure that our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your acknowledgment of their efforts. Additionally, we have taken note of your comments regarding your room’s view. Should you stay with us in your future travels, please let us know of any room preference you may have so we can do our best to place you in a room with a different view. Overall, we are glad to know you had a satisfactory visit and we hope you will choose to stay with us again on your next trip to the area.  Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary Heading: What you'd expect from a Marriott
Summary: Our stay was in a bay view 1 bedroom king suite. I highly recommend this view. The water helps you feel like you are more remote, vs just outside LA. The view also overlooks the pool.   Room was spacious, with frosted French doors separating the bedroom from the living room. Blanket was in the closet for the pull out couch. Patio door to the balcony opened from the living room. The bedroom had the same view and a large window with the ability to open.  Small refrigerator in the living area. Bathroom was big, with both a standing shower and a small tub. Toilet and bathing was separate from the sink, was a pass through between the bathroom and bedroom.   Water was offered in the lobby, both infused with lemon and one with orange. Proximity to the airport was not an issue for
Manager Response: Dear  watergirl6,  Thank you for your kind words and for staying at our hotel. We are thrilled to know that you had an excellent stay with us. We're especially glad we were able to provide you with a serene and comfortable suite, and that you enjoyed the in-room amenities we provide. Feedback like yours is celebrated at our staff meetings, and we truly appreciate your acknowledgment of our team’s efforts. It was our pleasure to be of service, and we hope to welcome you back soon. Safe travels!   Josef Eberhardt  Director of Hotel Operations Marriott Hotels Travel Brilliantly

Summary: We were able to get a room at last minute... Suite is nice, only down falls are no free WiFi in room plus no USB ports in room.. however, if you have a vehicle parking is free, so this is a plus for person's with vehicles. My phone and tablet were dead due to not having the ports. I found ports in the lobby on my last day there.. the room is nice and clean..the staff is awesome! overall, it's a nice place to stay
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We're happy to hear you enjoyed our parking but disappointed to hear about the Wi-Fi and appreciate your feedback about lack of ports for various devices. We'll pass this on to our team. If you choose to stay with us again we do provide free Wi-Fi for rewards members and hope you'll give us another opportunity to meet expectations.

Summary: First, the good points:  Nice location across from a trailhead to the bay and close to UC Irvine, very well designed rooms, smaller hotel with contemporary styling.  Not so good, extra charge for wifi and parking so felt nickled and dimed.  In the end, our Marriot Rewards card enabled us to get free wifi.  Also, the parking lot was being paved while we were guests and the fee was waved.  Parking structure across the street was $15/day compared to $28 at the hotel so that could be an option for guests.
Manager Response: Thank you for such a kind review, Diane! We appreciate you taking the time to submit your feedback here and we are happy you enjoyed your stay. We hope to host you again in the future.

Summary: Currently staying here for 4 nights w/ my husband for his business trip. We had originally booked 2 nights, but decided to stay for duration of trip because it is so comfortable & pleasant. Agree w/ other reviewers that it's not an extravagant Marriott & furnishings are a bit dated, but rooms are spacious & clean, staff are really friendly, great food at the on-site restaurant, nice clean pool area and pleasant view of the small bay. About 15 min drive to Newport Beach; directly next to Irvine businesses. Great value - would def return for this type of trip.
Manager Response: Dear Taradella,  Thank you for staying at Newport Beach Marriott Bayview and for your excellent rating and kind words! We love receiving comments like yours, as our goal is to ensure a memorable experience for every guest. We appreciate you sharing your feedback and look forward to seeing you on your next visit.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Nice and good hotel, surely it is expensive! Parking, internet and breakfast is extra $$$  Nice patio and pool area. Rooms are suites and nice spacious. Room service is great. Self parking. Love the place and patio face the lake view.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review! While we're glad that you loved our property, from our pool and rooms to our service and views. We truly appreciate all of your input and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Stayed 8-10 Jun with my teenage son. Check in was a breeze and very attentive staff.  Rm on 9th floor facing the creek, king bed and separate living room which had a pull out. Very nice lobby, restaurant, outdoor patio and ground.  Mini fridge provided and no safe. Excellent assortment at breakfast buffet. Decent gym and pool/jacuzzi area. Excellent running trail very close by. Table gas fire pits outside for cocktails.  Parked on the street Bayview Way with no issue. 20 mins drive to Newport Beach Pier area or 25 mins to HB Pier. Excellent stay!
Manager Response: We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay! Thank you for your wonderful review. From our staff to our breakfast offerings, we're glad you loved it all. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The hotel is very nice! Delicious restaurant too. Staff very pleasant. Room was spacious - giant bathroom. We had a room with a "view" and balcony but it overlooked a parking lot. Next time I would request a water view. Not very expensive considering the area though. Would totally stay again! 😊
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! It's wonderful to hear that you were pleased with your stay, from our staff to our guest rooms. We appreciate all of your valuable feedback and we hope to welcome you back for a five-star stay next time.

Summary Heading: Clean comfortable and convenient in Irvine
Summary: Stayed 3 nights recently in a one bedroom suite at this conveniently located Irvine Marriott.  Room was up to usual Marriott standards – comfortable and functional, though not extravagant.  Service was generally fine, though housekeeping staff were quite loud while socializing with one another in the hallways – necessitating a “shssh” to keep the noise level down.  Room service was prompt, and the breakfast buffet was delicious and reasonably priced.  Best hotel feature, though, is its location – a quick ride to Irvine businesses along either Jamboree or MacArthur.  Will definitely consider for future stays when travelling to Orange Co area.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your honest and valuable feedback. While we're thrilled that you loved our location, we're sorry to hear that other aspects of your stay did not exceed your expectations like we would have hoped. We truly hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a five-star stay in every way in the future.

Summary: Really nice hotel, quiet and close to many businesses. All rooms have a lounge and a bedroom and are really large. The staff are super polite and very hospitable. I would return here for sure.   The food in the restaurant is a bit on the pricey side but the waiter staff are very polite and the quality of the food was good.   Rooms are clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We're thrilled to hear that you loved not only our location, but also our guest rooms and staff. We always love hearing from our guests and this is no exception. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: No concierge lounge but really great hotel
Summary: I'm really stuck on the rating.  If this hotel contained some separate amenities for for gold/platinum members, its would easily be 5 stars.  Without it, its like 3.5 for me.    What am I looking for for Gold/Platinum members.  I'd take a fridge/closet where I can take my keycard and grab some water / soft drinks.  I personally really hate having to go to the front desk to get a water bottle.  It would also be great to have a separate work area so I'm not stuck in my room.  I'm personally ok with grabbing the free breakfast at the downstairs restaurant which was very very good, and in many ways is significantly better than what I would get at most Marriott concierge lounges.    The hotel itself has the nicest Marriott rooms I've ever had.  The space was great and the layout
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your valuable feedback. We do value our Marriott Rewards guests and we appreciate all of your input. It's wonderful to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast offerings! Thank you again and we hope to welcome you back for a five-star stay soon.

Summary: My husband and I recently stayed here. We were in town to attend my father in laws funeral.  When we were checking in we were asking if we could get an early check in as we needed to change out of our travel clothes into something more appropriate for the celebration of life service.  Mallory who was helping us was very quick to reply that she would be happy to accommodate our needs.  She even comped the parking fee!  The next evening my husband and I had ordered  some dinner from room service. About 10 minutes after we had received our dinner someone from room service knocked on our door again.  This time it was tray of very fancy cheeses, crackers, cold cuts and a bottle of Cabernet Sauvignon that Mallory sent us along with a lovely hand written note asking us if there was
Manager Response: Service is very important to us so when we hear from our guests that they experienced outstanding service, nothing makes us happier. We're thrilled to hear that Mallory was able to help make your weekend more comfortable. We're very sorry for your loss and we hope your family is doing well. Thank you for your kind review.

Summary Heading: Another great visit at the Marriott Bayview
Summary: This was the second time we've stayed here and again were really pleased with our stay. A great location overlooking Newport Bay and a much smaller scale than the nearby Fashion Island Marriott, a huge, beautiful convention center oriented property with spa. Outdoor seating by the fire-pits for a glass of wine is really nice and peaceful in the evening. West end of the hotel is away from busy Jamboree street and has the best bay views if you choose that room type. Thanks Mallory for finding us a great room and Jimmy and Jonathan from At your Service for the prompt response. We'll be back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to our hotel! We're thrilled that your second stay was as wonderful as your first, from our location to our prompt service. We loved hearing about your stay and we're so glad you loved relaxing by the fire. Come back and see us again soon!

Summary: I love this hotel, always great service.  Large rooms.  Some nice views of Back Bay, pool is nice, not a big resort or anything, just a nice hotel, always clean and friendly.  Some of the rooms have murphy beds.
Manager Response: We couldn't be happier to hear how much you love staying with us! From our service to our views, it sounds like you truly enjoy it all. Thank you for your wonderful review and we hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Stay was very nice. Large and clean room. Very quiet.  Suite with close bedroom. Staff were very nice all week. Our meeting room was perfect. The breakfast, lunches and snacks were different every day. Serve by very polite and efficient server.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your meeting with us! From our staff to our rooms, it sounds like you loved it all. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we hope you'll consider coming back in the future.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a short stay, especially a business trip
Summary: Lovely hotel, friendly staff.  Great for a business meeting. Not so great if you have family with you as there is not very much to do in the immediate vicinity. A short taxi drive to Newport beach and there is lots more to do.  Has a Starbucks in the lobby which my kids loved!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We're thrilled you loved our friendly staff and our on-site Starbucks. We appreciate all of your valuable feedback and we hope you'll come see us again soon!

Summary: I went for a night overnight stay just to get some peace and quiet, sleep in, have room service and enjoy being in a nice hotel. I was NOT disappointed. Mica at check-in was very nice and friendly. Genuinely wanted me to enjoy me stay.Told her why I was there and she gave me a late checkout-just over and beyond.  I had 342, partial bay view (windows open plus a balcony!). I could stay here with my family the room was so spacious and comfortable. I had a bit of trouble with Wi-fi on my phone but my laptop connected fine. standard Marriott amenities means bed, robe, pillows-everything was comfy. Good Water pressure in the shower. no bellman or valet but when i called to request a fork ( i was a bit far from the lobby) it took a few minutes but somone happily brought one up. room
Manager Response: Thank you very much for such a detailed 5-star review! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us, from the personalized service to our amenities. We do appreciate your feedback regarding pricing and portion size as well. We look forward to your next visit with your family!

Summary Heading: Nice facilities, great staff throughout, typical not-quite-five-star Marriott otherwise
Summary: Excellent, modern, clean facility in a quiet location. Staff is especially good -- a notch better (more personable, friendly) than most Marriotts. Restaurant offering is just OK. Portions are strangely small. Most of us need help in not eating too much, but this Marriott is trying to help rather too much! Also, the dishes on offer are just so-so. But, there are plenty of really good restaurants in the area.  One irritant is you have to pay for WIFI -- $12.95 per day for "basic," more for a faster connection. In this day and age WIFI should be free.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this 4-star review, Edward. We're happy to hear you found the hotel to be clean and our staff personable and friendly. We appreciate your feedback regarding your dining experience and WiFi as well, and we hope to welcome you back on your next visit.

Summary Heading: Relaxing hotel with great views in Newport Beach - Parking tip!
Summary: The Marriott Bayview is a relaxing gem of a hotel near a giant nature preserve in Newport Beach. We had a room with fantastic views of the bay and nature area. The trail is steps out the door and was extremely enjoyable, especially with the super bloom of wildflowers.   Check-in was a breeze and the lobby area was modern, clean, and upscale. Fruit flavored water was an excellent touch and always full.  As some other reviewers have noted, this is not the most modern hotel (rooms in particular) and is probably due for some renovation. Despite this, my room was ultra-clean and well maintained. The bed was extremely comfortable and touches like a fridge and modern USB alarm clock/docking station were appreciated.   The room itself is huge and divided into a living area and bedroom
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this wonderful review! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay and that you were able to take advantage of our great location near the nature preserve, as well as our hotel amenities. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit!

Summary Heading: A clean but worn typical Marriott
Summary: The Marriott Bayview is a clean property with friendly service.  It looks tired and needs a serious refresh both in the common areas and rooms.   Here are some specifics that are important to me and might be important to you:  Noise level: my room was very quiet Condition:  tired looking but everything worked Cleanliness: my room was clean Style: average old Marriott style Service: very friendly Bed:  comfortable Lighting:  lots of lighting fixtures, and with all of them on, it was nearly bright enough Bathroom     Shower:  separate shower and tub.  The pressure had typical California water-saver pressure     Counter space: adequate      Amenities: typical Marriott quality  Restaurant: mediocre, with a small selection Outlets: good availability  In room safe: no, which to me is
Manager Response: Thank you for both your positive and constructive feedback. We're very pleased to hear that you loved our friendly service and clean property. We also appreciate you providing us with your honest constructive input. Thank you again and we hope to welcome you back for a five-star stay in the future.

Summary Heading: Comfortable hotel close to Upper Newport Bay Nature Preserve
Summary: Right across the street from the protected estuary, this hotel's location means easy access to birding and trails. It's also convenient to Orange County freeways for ease of access to the rest of Orange and L.A. counties.
Manager Response: Thank you for this wonderful review. We're happy to see that you enjoyed your stay and were able to enjoy our great location and the beautiful nature preserve. We hope to welcome you back on your next visit!

Summary: First time staying here and have never been so disrespected by any staff let alone at a marriott property. Can't believe this property even has the marriott name. You guys need to train your staff better and not hire people that have zero customer service. Don't stay here save your money
Manager Response: We're concerned about your experience. Would you mind sending us a private message with your reservation and contact information so we can look into this?

Summary Heading: Large hotel huge room, no free internet
Summary: Spend two nights at the Marriott. Got a very, very large room, excellent, not with sea view. The hotel is very large. A historic interest: the hotel still charges for internet, something I could not find not even in Africa. Also try to charge for everything, even bottles of water not drunk. Staff service not 4 stars.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this 4-star review, we're happy to hear that you enjoyed your room. We appreciate your feedback regarding our staff and the charges as well. We hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future for a flawless visit.

Summary: Very pleasant setting with bayside walking trail across the street. Bar and restaurant staff friendly and attentive. Food is better than average hotel fare. We would stay again.  Sunny pool setting- wish I brought my swimsuit.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review with us. We're glad to hear you enjoyed our prime location, friendly staff, and delicious dining options. We look forward to welcoming you again soon and hope your next visit is enjoyed poolside!

Summary: I stayed at the Marriott Bayview, which is one of the best places in Orange County.  The views of the Backbay are just beautiful and it's a VERY comfortable place.  I love staying there.  The building is amazing and is being updated a bit at a time.    Last time I stayed there I opted to have breakfast there and was sorely disappointed, I'd had breakfast there a few months ago and it was very good.   I can't figure out why anyone would fry an egg in heavy oil.  That was the only thing wrong with my stay.  It was very comfortable and relaxing.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this detailed review. We're thrilled to hear you found your stay with us comfortable and relaxing and were able to enjoy our great location and fantastic views! We're sorry to hear you were disappointed with breakfast. We appreciate your feedback and will pass this along to our team. We hope to welcome you back for a flawless visit!

Summary: Rooms are ok - decent size...clean... Staff very friendly....no issues there. The building needs a reno...its from the 70's  or it seems... Gym is an afterthought in a dungeon....very annoying.. Food fair... FInally...they charge for internet...   in 2017!!    Whaaaaat??
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your honest review with us. We're thrilled you found our staff so friendly but we're disappointed to hear that not every aspect of your stay exceeded your expectations. Thank you for sharing your constructive feedback with us. You may be happy to hear for next time that we do offer complimentary in-room wi-fi to Marriott Rewards members who book directly. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a five-star stay soon.

Summary Heading: best Newport Beach hotel value with cookies & fruity water
Summary: we got a partial bayview suite at very low AAA rate w/ hot breakfast, $55/night cheaper than Island Hotel (which we also like but not at the price difference)--can't beat what we got given the area hotels: pros: + staff attentive: recognized member status at chk-in, various issues resolved quickly + room: suite included French doors between Bedroom and Living room that had a sofa bed as well. cookies late afternoon on weekdays w/ coffee/tea, and fruity water tanks all the time in lobby. pool & hot tub & gym looked nice (didn't use) + location/parking: skipped daily parking fee using weekend street parking 4 minute walk away--parallel to walking trail with lots of nature to view (flocks of birds, greenery). 2 min drive to Jamboree Rd leading to roads for airport or Fashion Island
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write this detailed review. We're thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us, including all of our amenities, location and the service our staff provided. We appreciate your feedback on your experience with housekeeping, and we're happy to hear the matter was addressed right away. We hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future for a flawless stay.

Summary: Rooms are a great size and staff is friendly. Really enjoy the fruit infused water but coffee/bagels in restaurant/bar are were overpriced. There is a nice variety of items for purchase next to the front desk if so inclined.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We're delighted to hear that you found our guest rooms spacious, our staff friendly and our water refreshing. We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: I stayed in a king suite on the 5th floor which gave me a nice view of the "bay" and city. The room is nicely laid out with a bathroom separating the bedroom and living room area so that guests sleeping on the pull out sofa don't have to bother the occupants in the bedroom (and vis versa). The room was clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review with us! We're thrilled to hear that you loved our views and guest rooms. We truly appreciate your positive feedback. Should your travels ever bring you back to the area, we hope to welcome you back!

Summary: My husband and I have stayed here dozens of times and always enjoyed it until our last stay over Thanksgiving. My husband has special needs and the hotel had always honored those needs. They asked us to call ahead so they could have things ready, So we always did. This time my husband called three times before our arrival to make sure there would be no problems. When we arrived nothing had been done to prepare the room. They told us to wait in the lobby and they would prepare the room. We waited 3 hours in the lobby while they worked on the room!! The room we finally got was noisy, on the second floor, and the bed extremely uncomfortable. Our bill was a mess and we had wait at checkout for quite awhile so they could straighten it out.  After we left they ask how our stay was and
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your honest feedback with us. We're very sorry to hear about your experience. We assure you this is not typical of the experience we strive to provide at our hotel. We appreciate you letting us know so we can look into this. We have sent you a private message in hopes that we can follow up with you directly as well.

Summary: It's an older hotel but pretty nice. The rooms are suites with a separate seating area and a big bathroom. They have complimentary fruit/mint-infused water in the lobby. Parking costs $19 per night, which is absurd.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your room and bathroom, as well as our infused water. We do appreciate your feedback regarding parking as well. We hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit.

Summary: We have returned many times to this hotel, it is one of our favorites, the entire staff makes us feel like it is our home away from home. The rooms are so spacious and great to have a small fridge and coffee set-up. Perfect if you need a longer stay.look forward to the breakfast and the chef's attention to making us exactly what we want. And it was a great surprise to be served warm fresh cookies and coffee in the lobby, really appreciated. A special shout out to the housekeepers who really go above and beyond. So centrally located near beach, back bay,South Coast,Fashion Island, the Lab. We will pick this hotel again.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear this! Thank you for taking the time to submit this review. We're happy to know you enjoyed the room amenities, our location and our fantastic chef and housekeepers. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit!

Summary: All the rooms are large suites with good layouts.  Very clean with large windows.  The views from the upper floors are good.  You cannot see the ocean, but you can see the waterway.  There is a gym that is good for aerobic, but not weights.  You need a car to get around, but fashion island is nearby as well as many restaurants within 5 minutes.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay, CalGrizzlyBear. We're glad you enjoyed our spacious accommodations, views, and proximity to local attractions and hope for another opportunity to welcome you to Newport Beach in the future!

Summary Heading: A very clean, relaxing and pleasant hotel, with a nice breakfast.
Summary: My husband and I spent a very nice and relaxing evening at this hotel. It is near everything. The rooms are very large and the beds are very comfortable.  The windows keep out the traffic noise on Jamboree, and the traffic dies down later in the evening. Tourist please note, this is not on the ocean, but there is a wide creek like water way that connects to the ocean that rooms on the south side view.  We enjoyed the breakfast buffet in the morning. We enjoyed the biscuits and gravy, fresh fruit, and their chef makes awesome omelettes.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to submit this wonderful review! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed our location, breakfast, beds and your overall stay with us. We hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back again in the future!

Summary: Very clean, comfortable and suited my needs. The hotel is by an airport but there is a flight curfew so the noise is not a concern after about 10 or 11 PM. I got a nice view of the business area of Newport Beach but no "bayview" here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We love hearing that you found our accommodations comfortable and everything about your stay met your needs. Thank you for letting us know about your experience. We truly hope to welcome you back for a five-star stay soon!

Summary Heading: Good sleep quality & overall good comfort
Summary: This was a solid Marriott with plenty of comfort, but a few smaller things prevent me from giving it 5 stars: -work out room was only accessible by walking outside through the pool area to a new, indoor hallway.  Other than this, the gym was nice and convenient (open 24 hrs). -shower pressure was weak, although it is an important measure given the CA drought. -very limited counter space in the bathroom.  Some benefits to highlight: -nice spa water (water naturally flavored with fresh fruits) by the front desk and door -great sleep quality as the hotel was very quiet whenever I was in my room in the evening til the morning. -nice smelling toiletries -wifi signal strength and speed was good in room and in fitness center
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us, lws07. We appreciate your feedback regarding our gym access, shower pressure, and counter space and are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our amenities and a restful night of sleep during your stay. Should your travels bring you back to Newport Beach, we hope to welcome you again!

Summary: I stay at this hotel for just over a month related to work. The hotel is very nice the staff is excellent and the restaurant is convenient and quality. I would recommend this hotel for anyone looking to spend a weekend in the area. The rooms were huge(suite) and extremely clean.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to submit this review. We're glad to hear you enjoyed your extended stay with us as well as our staff and convenient location. Thank you for your recommendation and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Very good hotel - on business trip
Summary: Have stayed here twice already. Both were for business trip purposes.  The room is nice as it has a separate "sleeping area" with double french doors. It gives a nice suite feeling to the room. In addition there is separate work area with a big table and network connections that is essential for business people.  There are 2 TVs: one in the seating area and another inside the sleeping area. This is great as you can watch TV directly from the bed.  There is also mini fridge in room.  The bathroom is big: it has both a shower stall and a separate bath tub and also separate sink area making the whole bathroom are huge.  Pros: - big room with big bathroom with a lot of amenities - good for business trips. Many business people stay here. - nice views of the bay if you pick rooms
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review, we are thrilled you have been able to enjoy our hotel on multiple occasions. We truly appreciate your feedback and hope we have the opportunity to welcome you again soon!

Summary: We stayed in this hotel for two nights while visiting New Port. The hotel is very clean. The connecting rooms are awesome and big enough for family of 6, friendly staff. We wish wifi was free for kids to enjoy after long hours of activities outside, just like the nearby Hilton hotel were the family stayed for one night.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this kind review. We're glad to see you and your family enjoyed your stay. We definitely hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back during your next visit, and we recommend joining Marriott Rewards. It is free to join and it includes complimentary wifi for members. Happy New Year!

Summary: Very nice room cannot complain bigger room than most hotel in the area 30 minute drive to Santa Monica beach 10 minutes away to Newport Beach peaceful quiet clean hotel highly recommend it bike trail right in back of the hotel walking distance to the trail perfect for bringing The bike to the hotel to ride the bike trail along the ocean perfect weather cannot beat it Hotel room it's about 1000 ft.² including the living room
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us, Cuong. We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed our spacious accommodations and accessible location. We hope to welcome you again for another relaxing stay in Newport Beach!

Summary: A perfect new room with a perfect bed (I'm capricious about pillows and mattresses..), very fast room-service, very cosy! I had a great rest after my flight and a jet lag the night before. A very good breakfast, spacy place. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, Eva! We're so happy to hear you found our accommodations to be cozy and breakfast delicious. We know how important a restful night of sleep is while traveling, so your comfort is our top priority. Should your travels bring you back to Newport Beach in the future, we hope to welcome you again!

Summary Heading: Below average performance at an above average price
Summary: Lost or confused my reservation twice in 2016.  The heating and A/C unit in my room did not work.  The dinner menu is very limited and rarely changes.  The staff is professional and friendly while doing their best to accommodate management related deficiencies.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your valuable feedback. We aim to provide all of our guests with a five-star experience and we're very sorry that we did not deliver on that for you. We will be sure to address your concerns internally. Thank you again and we hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a seamless stay in the future.

Summary: Pretty standard accommodations for  a Marriott but they were good.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.   Best thing about this marriott is the location.  It is in a very quiet spot which is a great plus.  Also it is extremely close to a very good bike/walking/running path that goes around the bay.  The hotel has bikes for rent as well and it is a very easy access to path with minimal to no issues with being or crossing traffic.  Has a very good exercise room as well.  While room rate was reasonable for the area other items are pretty expensive i.e. coffee, drinks etc however it is southern california where they give you a price for the room and then charge 20 to 30 dollars to park your own car.  It was 28 dollars at this location I believe.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review, Jeff! We're delighted that you loved our friendly staff, ideal location and excellent fitness center. Keeping on track with fitness goals while traveling can be hard so we try to make it easy on our guests! We greatly appreciate your kind feedback and we hope to welcome you back for a five-star experience very soon.

Summary: We've been staying at the Bayview almost annually as it's such a great location and the rooms are so spacious and comfortable. The staff is always friendly and helpful. I often have them make dinner reservations for me. I love to walk on the path around the back bay preserve. It's so quiet and peaceful, yet the hotel is easy access to other parts of Newport and Corona del Mar. The breakfast at the hotel is good and the mornings are bright and cheerful on the patio. Just with they had some umbrellas for breakfast. Would choose this hotel every time I'm in the area.
Manager Response: We appreciate your generous review, Christie! It thrills us to hear that we've become a part of your annual tradition and that you've found our rooms to be spacious and comfortable. Should you visit Newport Beach soon, we hope to welcome you back for another year of memories with your family.

Summary: After a month of five hours a day at Eisenhower with my husband's mother, and a several hours at Fairhaven Memorial Park, we decided to stay here before our five month family planned trip to Mexico! Great staff! Sarah made it so easy for us to unwind!   Best employee. Helped us with planning for a night here after we returned from Puerto Vallarta, also leaving car here rather than driving to airport! Marriott staff is the best! I really appreciated Sarah's help as we were so exhausted! Even Tang also helped us with printing documents! Greatest support staff! So helpful! Plan to stay here every time we fly out of John Wayne! Restaurant food spectacular! Great appetizers!
Manager Response: We're so happy to hear about your experience, Carol! Nothing makes us happier than when our guests find our hotel the perfect place for them to unwind. We appreciate you letting us know about Sarah's hospitality! We're very lucky to have her on our team. Thank you for your kind words and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I give this an excellent due to the staff. From checkin until leaving they are helpful, professional and welcoming. Breakfast is very good and the servers do an excellent job. Javier is a great breakfast chef. I use this location for business in the Irvine/San Diego area and never disappointed. Great hotel, clean and well maintained.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review, Paul! We're so happy to hear that you found our service helpful and our breakfast delicious. Hospitality is very important to us so we're very glad we were able to provide you with such exceptional service. Should your travels ever bring you back to the area, we hope to be your hotel of choice.

Summary: This facility is clean and well-maintained.  The rooms are spacious - we had a mini-suite with a large bathroom (walk-in shower, tub, toilet all contained behind a pocket door, sink area with double sinks but cramped configuration and no place to put a cosmetic bag or towel, but also behind a second pocket door) accessible from the bedroom with king bed (hard mattress), two nightstands and TV, or from living area with sofa, chair, desk, TV, ottoman (all very comfortable and in good condition).  Closet space was adequate for a short stay.  Small balcony with nice view.  A/C was a little tricky in that if you increased the temp by just two degrees, the heater came on!  Not so nice was the $28 per night parking fee (at least you had in & out privileges) or the $17 in-room wifi
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your day to review us. We're thrilled you enjoyed the breakfast so much. We also greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you in the future.

Summary: I had the opportunity to stay at the Marriott a few nights for business. The property is at a great location, close to a number of businesses, the airport (John Wayne) and the freeway.   The all-suite hotel was clean and the rooms and bathrooms provided plenty of space, views, and a couple sliders which let plenty of air in the room.   The common space was very nice with outside tables and couches surrounding fire pits. The hotel also has a nice indoor-outdoor pool.  The restaurant was on par for a hotel, however, breakfast got a little busy at times, and ordering off the menu could end up taking longer than expected and the buffet was on the expensive side. There also was not a concierge lounge for breakfast and/or waters.   I did enjoy the hotel though and would absolutely
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed how clean and spacious your room was, and that you found our location to be central to all of your needs. While we're disappointed to hear that our breakfast buffet was a bit busier than usual, we hope to welcome you back for another brilliant stay and exceed your expectations in the future.

Summary Heading: Loved This Hotel and Great Area for Walking
Summary: I really enjoyed this hotel although I had a very short stay.  By the time I got to the hotel it was late and I went straight to bed.  The next morning I got up and went for a walk in the area behind the hotel...how peaceful!  The room I was given was huge!  I had a sitting area, a huge bathroom and a bedroom area, all in all it was larger than most studio apartments.  The bed was comfy, I had a great night sleep and the facilities in general were great.  My only regret was that my stay was so short....next time I'll check in early and check out late :)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to leave us a review. We are thrilled that you had such a brilliant experience and enjoyed your large room and comfortable bed. We too regret that you couldn't stay longer. Once again, thank you for your review and we look forward to welcoming you back in the very near future.

Summary: Stayed one night on a recent business trip and loved it. Service was friendly and the room was very nice and clean. Workout room had plenty of equipment and the outdoor space was nice. Great service in the lobby bar restaurant, and the food was fine. Wine was a little expensive by the glass, and the view from the balcony included a freeway, but overall, great experience. I'll be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property, We like to think that our propery is beautiful but our service is the reason we shine. We hope you come visit again soon!  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: I attended a conference at another Marriott in Newport Beach, but we were assigned rooms at this hotel instead. My co-workers and I were truly pleasantly surprised! The rooms were nice, large suites with balconies and really comfortable beds. We also had dinner in the hotel restaurant one night and it was pretty good. I didn't use the amenities (pool) because it was actually raining, but overall, I really enjoyed my stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, We like to think that our little property is unique in many ways with our suite designs and Food & Beverage offerings unique to the area. We hope you come visit again soon on a sunny day so you can enjoy the pool with great views of the Backbay!  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary Heading: Stay off this hotel if you prefer modern looking hotel...
Summary: Our visit was for 5 days 4 nights. Room is huge, bed was even bigger. For a couple with two kids below 3 years old, the bed was heaven sent. No kicks to the ribs or sleeping by the edge. In fact, that's what we did most of the time, sleeping as if to catching back the sleep that we lose due to parenting.  The room is dated though albeit with the right necessity such as minibar, TV with limited channels, wardrobe, iron and ironing board, hairdryer etc. So to the modernists out there, you might want to check out other hotels. Our room also came with a balcony so that's refreshing since most hotel rooms does not have windows.  There are pools including kids pool with slides, kids club, gym for the fitness freaks.  WiFi is above although not super fast.  Location wise OK, abundant
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of our property! We are so proud to have such a beautiful property in Newport Beach that's so close to everything California has to offer. We hope you come back and visit soon...  Thank you again,  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary Heading: Quiet hotel with excellent room service
Summary: There are many dining options in the area, but was pleasantly surprised how good the food was for room service. I ordered the shrimp tacos and they were delivered hot like at a restaurant.  Room was clean and beds comfortable. One star short of a five star rating since the resort fee and parking are expensive.  However, when the overall cost is comparable to nearby hotels, I would definitely select this Marriott.
Manager Response: Thank you for such a great review, we take pride in having a beautiful property and friendly staff, and amazing local inspired food offerings. I will share your review with our team and make sure the chef knows that his food made an impact on your stay.  We hope to see you soon back in Newport Beach!  Regards,  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: This was a very nice, clean hotel, but short on including the nice-to-have amenities:  No free breakfast, you only get one regular coffee and one decaf with the in-room tiny coffee pot, and parking is $28 a day.  A beer costs about $10, continental breakfast about $18. If you're not a Marriott rewards member, Internet will cost $13 a day.   The room design is nice - a sitting area (sofa opens to a bed), with a desk, and a separate bedroom.  The bathroom can be closed off for privacy in either area.  There is a separate shower and tub, but there is nowhere to put your things while bathing other than the floor.  More hooks for towels and clothing would be nice. Our room only had room darkening curtains.  No sheers.  So it was full view and light, or total darkness.   There is an
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of our property! We are so proud to have such a beautiful property in Newport Beach that's so close to everything California has to offer. I am sorry that our amenities were not 100% to your liking but I hope you consider us in the future when traveling to Newport Beach.    Thank you again,  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: When on travels in Orange County, I gladly return to the Marriott Bayview. This hotel is great for business and leisure.   High marks for being very clean and very pet friendly!!  They offer dog relief areas, doggie hydration stations, and allow you to bring your pets to dinner (but you must eat outdoors, understandably).   The rooms are very spacious:  living room, dry bar, bedroom, and bathroom. Plenty of room for you, family, and pets to spread out.   High marks on the food. Always good.   Come-and-go surface parking offers security and ease of access.   Overall a great choice!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our beautiful property! We have tried to create an inclusive destination that our guests and the lucky furry family members can all enjoy. Our culinary team is always looking for new trends and creative dishes to entice and intrigue our ever changing guests...  Thank you again for your review and we hope you come visit again soon!  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: My family and I stayed here for the labour day weekend, stay was good the only problem was the sheets where worn out and felt like sleeping on sand grains I had to call for newer ones and they provided them. I would have given it a higher rating if it weren't for those sheets.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, we are sorry you didn't enjoy every aspect of our property. We strive to be a leader in the market and worn out sheets are not the standard we try and uphold.  . We hope that you think of us in the future when traveling to Newport Beach.  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary Heading: Nice view, good value, very clean, good facilities, but no free wifi
Summary: No problem with this place, would definitely stay there again next time I am out there on business, but no free wifi come on! Had to knock a star off for that, this is 2016 and that just doesn't cut it anymore.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of our property. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and hope you come visit again soon!  I invite you to register for our Marriott Rewards program, one great benefit as a member if you book directly with Marriott you receive complimentary wifi at all of our properties.    JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: We had a Bay view Suite Room, which had a separate living room area, a small balcony and a lovely bedroom suite, The bed was luxurious, as well as the bathroom. A large shower and a separate tub. The outdoor area is also beautiful, large areas for guests which include ample cozy seating areas around fire pits and large sofas to enjoy the beautiful night sky! The pool is large, clean and well kept. I read some of the other reviews and I cant believe they stayed at this Marriott! The staff is extremly friendly, and courteous. The only downside was breakfast is quite expensive, otherwise this hotel is Excellent!
Manager Response: Thank you for such a great review of our property, I love that you titled the review "Simply Excellent" as this is how we start each day's team meeting to have a "simply Excellent day" we hope you can come visit again soon.   JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: This was my first time staying at this Marriott and I was a little apprehensive since at first glance the hotel seemed a bit dated. Once inside it is updated and stylish the layout is nice and open the patio and pool have a beautiful view of the bay. Staff were friendly and check in and check out were smooth. I will definitely stay here again thanks Marriott!
Manager Response: Thank you for such a great review, we take pride in having a beautiful property and friendly staff. I will share your review with our team and note the great memory and service you had while visiting us.  Regards,  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: The hotel is fair, very kind service and very large rooms better to say suits and hotel is great value for money if u book early and it has guest laundry facility ( do it your own ) if you really wanted to.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your review of our property. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us and will absolutely welcome you back whenever you are in the Newport Beach area again. Have a great week.  Warmest regards,  Sean

Summary: Very happy to have stayed here while helping my daughter who lived nearby and just had her second baby. Sometimes I was at the hotel by myself and I felt very safe, thanks to the warm contacts with the staff at the front desk, who always greeted me as well as other guests who returned to the hotel at the end of the day. When my husband joined me, he was also very impressed with the hotel and staff. We found the rooms, linens and towels to always be very clean and the hotel was very quiet and situated with a beautiful view of the sunset over the bay every evening. I would like to especially thank Mika at the front desk who helped me so much during my extended stay which included added reservations for additional family members who were visiting. We will always remember her
Manager Response: Thank you for such a great review of our property and associate who made such an impact while you were here.  We hope you can come visit again soon and that we can be your home in Newport Beach when visiting family. I will share your review with our team and recognize Mica for the great memory and service.  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: The rooms are nice as is the staff.  The workout room was clean and everything worked.  Overall this was a nice hotel but I was surprised there was no concierge lounge.  This is something I expect at each Marriott.   Overall it was a nice stay but I am not sure I will be back due to this.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for your review of our property. We apologize that we don't offer a concierge lounge for our most loyal customers. We do appreciate your business very much and hope that you may visit us again when you in the Newport Beach area. Have a wonderful weekend.  Warmest regards,  Sean

Summary: I wouldn't call this an airport hotel.  The proximity is nice, but there are no noise or traffic issues at all.  The running trail adjacent along the bay is very close and is a nice amenity!  The property is in really good shape with nice large rooms with appropriate upgrades.  Doesn't appear to have bellman service, but provided the carts to move your luggage.  The parking access is a bit cumbersome and does have a costs, ($30/day) but this is standard for California.  Overall, a really excellent, lower-costs option to stay close to Newport Beach area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of our property, we hope you can come visit again soon. Our goal is always to provide a great experience that makes our guests think more about relaxing and enjoying everything Newport Beach and less about travel and work.   Come back soon...   JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: Nice overall. Service and staff were just okay and could use some customer service training (or personality test?) but the rooms were nice sized (though old) and the restaurant was pretty good (servers need training). It really is just a staff issue at this point. More skilled/friendly desk staff and better trained servers would make this hotel experience significantly more pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, we are sorry you didn't enjoy every aspect of our property.  If you have any specific details that I can use to develop my team please e-mail me directly.  We hope that you think of us in the future when traveling to Newport Beach.  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: Very friendly and clean. While convenient a little out of the way. Nice running trail right behind the hotel well maintained exercises facility as well. Five minute Uber ride to Fashion Island area. Better for business than pleasure.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for the review of the property. We hope that you had time to relax and enjoy our property and the area around the hotel, please think of us when traveling to Newport Beach in the future.  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: Beautiful hotel. Great staff. Super room service. Close to airport without airport noise. Nice pool, grounds are in great shape. Medium size so no overwhelming crowds. A number of small business groups were meeting and seemed to be well taken care of.  Only constructive criticism is need to clear room service trays in hallways more frequently. Also need to have someone patrol and maintain pool more frequently. Very minor issues. Easily fixed.   Just need reassigning housekeeping staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of our property!  I have passed on the information you shared to the appropriate department heads so we can address the issues.  We are glad you enjoyed your stay and hope you come visit again soon!  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: A beautiful property centrally located near John Wayne Airport and Newport Coast and Fashion Island. The lobby was spacious with a wonderful dining area known as Vista Lounge. Plenty of seating on the patio also near the pool with views of the back bay. Enjoy a cocktail or appetizer served by the friendly staff(the Cheese Platter was delicious.) Our room was spacious and clean with a view of the bay and all the amenities. We enjoyed an excellent buffet breakfast on the day we departed. The Huevos Rancheros were magnifico. Parking is regulated by the hotel at a daily cost. Their are several conference rooms available as well as a gazebo in the garden area for ceremonies.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our beautiful property and friendly team! We have tried our best to build a team that treats our guests like family and provide service and food that make you say, Magnifico!  I will personally read your review to our associates as that always makes the team happy.... We hope you come visit again soon!  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary Heading: Good spot for visiting UC Irvine
Summary: Touring SoCal with my 2 high school seniors. This hotel is very conveniently located to UCI.  XC runner son used great trails along the creek for a workout. Our suite had a king bed, Murphy bed and sofa bed. Son who slept on Murphy bed reported it was very comfortable, much better than a sofa bed. Ask for room with one if you need the space. You have to pay for wifi unless you're Marriott rewards member. They have a Starbucks outpost in lobby, which I found convenient. My 2 sons had the breakfast buffet. At $25, it was great value for them, maybe not for light eaters. Both gave a big thumbs up for omelet bar! Overall, I thought hotel reasonable value for the price!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our property! We are glad you were able to explore the back bay and see why this hotel is so special. The suit design is perfect for traveling families and everyone loves the murphy bed.  We hope you come visit again soon!  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary Heading: One of the best Marriott I've been to
Summary: Beautiful Marriott. We stayed in the college suite. It's very cool, one king bedroom, pullout bed in the couch and a Murphy bed. Pool area is both indoor outdoor. Amazing workout room. Great customer service. A few of the Back Bay . Ate breakfast downstairs and it was very good as well. Downsides very close to the airport so you do you hear the airplanes but it's not terribly intrusive. Parking is $28.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review property, We like to think that our little property is unique in many ways with our suite designs and proximity to all things Southern California.   We hope you come visit again soon!  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: This is a nice, centrally located hotel in the Newport Beach area. Close to Newport Beach and an easy drive to Disneyland for families. Lots of good shopping close by and plenty of kid friendly food options. The pool was nice with an outdoor and indoor feature.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of our property! We are so proud to have such a beautiful property in Newport Beach that's so close to everything California has to offer.  We hope you come back and visit soon...  Thank you again,  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary Heading: Tremendous staff. Perfect location for visiting colleges.
Summary: All suites and the staff are great.  Michelle at the bar made me and my daughter feel great talking to us about the colleges.  Mika, at the front desk helped set us up for horse rides along the bay.  They both made me and my daughter feel like family.  We were on college visits so it was high stress for my daughter and a bit for me.   The Marriott made us feel like we were with family.  Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of our property! We are so happy to have a great team to support the property and give our guests wonderful memories to take home.  We pride ourselves in offering a great experience to our guests and love to hear stories of our team going out of there way to provide special services that make a difference.  We hope to see you again in the future and look forward to your return.   Thank you again,  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: Stayed here only one night. Pretty nice hotel by Marriott. We had a king suite with balcony and gorgeous bay view. The room and bed were wonderful the only complaint was that there was no chairs or table to sit out on the balcony and enjoy the view and room service really needs some improvement. The pool are is kind of small. The grounds around the property are nice and clean they have fire pits just off the pool are that are nice. Lots to do in Newport. Beaches are just a few miles down the road. Enjoyed the stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for the review of the property. We hope that you think of us in the future when traveling to Newport Beach.  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: Friendly reception staff. Quick check in. Nice lobby. Loved the breakfast. Rooms were large with a separate living room and had a comfortable furniture. I'd stay there again in the future. If you're interested in the bay view try to get rooms 17 and above i.e. 417, 517...etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of our property! We are glad you enjoyed your stay and hope you come visit again soon!  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: Yet again, I'm blown away by Marriott's commitment to customer service. First off, as soon as I walked through the front doors of the hotel, I was impressed. The lobby is newly renovated, and has a clean, chic feel. But what inspired me to write this review wasn't the beauty of the hotel, but the quality of the people with whom I first interacted when I arrived. Sarah and Mica went above and beyond to make me feel special on my birthday- I was away on business, [which is never ideal on my birthday], and they took the time to find me an upgraded room for my birthday! It made my night, and it's those kind of things that keep me a valued Marriott customer. I can't tell you the number of times I've walked into a hotel to hotel employees frowning, or less than pleasant- this hotel is
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our beautiful property and amazing team! We have tried our best to build a culture of above and beyond service and we love to hear when guests experience builds a great memory. I will personally recognize the two associates that made your stay special! We hope you come visit again soon!  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: This hotel was fine,  I can't say anything bad about it! We had food and drinks at hotel all of which were good.  Very close to airport which was nice!  We had 5 girls staying in one room and they were nice enough to upgrade us to a larger room for more space.  To my knowledge not really close enough to walk to anything, we used Uber to get around anywhere.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review property, We hope you come visit again soon!  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: Typical Marriott hotel, so there are no surprises as to the atmosphere or amenities.  Has a restaurant and bar upstairs and a bar near the pool.  Our room was fantastic with a small balcony off the living space and a huge bathroom.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of our property!  We pride ourselves in offering a great experience to our guests and a beautiful clean property to escape from the real world.   Thank you again,  JOSEF EBERHARDT | DIRECTOR OF HOTEL OPERATIONS MARRIOTT HOTELS | TRAVEL BRILLIANTLY Newport Beach Marriott Bayview | 500 Bayview Circle Newport Beach, CA 92660 D 949.509.6044 | F 949.854.3937 | C 702.348.7691 | marriott.com / NPBST josef.eberhardt@Marriott.com

Summary: Check in was easy and young lady at the front desk was very friendly and helpful. Our room was laid out well. The bed was comfortable. The closet was not suitable for storing luggage despite the fact that the luggage holder was in it. It had narrow sliding doors that were extremely difficult to fit luggage past. Then, if you did manage it you could not access the suitcase.  Besides the odd closet, the room and the hotel were very nice, clean and updated.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of our property! We have tried our best to build a team that love to work here and go above and beyond every day.
